<span style=\"color: purple;\">TILOTHAKAM DURING PINDA DAANAM &nbsp;TO DEAD ANCESTORS</span></span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"> - &nbsp;CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Both Sesame seed and\nDarbha ( Kusa ) grass emanated from the body of Lord Vishnu. &nbsp;For Hindus Sesame seed is hence a divine seed.\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">As per Garuda Purana ,\nan offering &nbsp;of Sesame seeds to ancestors\n(shraddha) prevents negative energies from posing obstacles in the homam rites.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">During Samudra manthan\n, the fibres flaked off the back of the giant tortoise by Mount Meru got mixed\nwith Amrit drops and was swept ashore , from which Darbha grass grew. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every Hindu knows that\nwhile doing Shradda for dead ancestors he has to sit of Darbha grass and also\nput a ring of this grass on his right hand 4<sup>th</sup> finger on which he\npours holy water into the earthen pot holding the cremated bone fragments..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">During Samudra Manthan\nLord Vishnu\u2019s sweat fell on the ground and this became Til or Sesame seeds.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">Sesame seed oil , Coconut oil and\nghee of vedic humped cows ( A2 milk ) are the only oils used by 6000 year old\nAyurveda. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sesame seed is\nmentioned as a seed of immortality in our Vedas written in Sanskrit 7000 years\nago. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sesame seeds first\nappeared in India , and then it spread over the rest of the world. &nbsp;Even today India is the largest exporter of\nSesame seeds. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One cup of natural\nsesame seeds has 1404 &nbsp;milligrams of\n<b>calcium </b>good for bone health&nbsp;, while one cup of &nbsp;whole milk has\nonly 291 milligrams of calcium.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">In addition to\npromoting healthy skin,<b> zinc</b> has also been shown to boost bone mineral density\nand bone health as a whole. &nbsp;There is a correlation between zinc deficiency and\nosteoporosis in the hip and spine area. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The high amounts of\n<b>magnesium</b> and zinc present in the seed help in strengthening </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">blood circulation and neural impulses.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sesame seeds are a\nnaturally rich source of <b>phytosterols &nbsp;</b>(\n410 mg per 100 gms ).&nbsp; &nbsp;They have the &nbsp;ability to help lower your LDL, or \u201cbad\u201d\ncholesterol levels. &nbsp; Normally,\ncholesterol , &nbsp;both from your food and\nliver is absorbed through the small intestine and circulates into the\nbloodstream. Phytosterols, however, are minimally absorbed from the small\nintestine, so they do not enter into the bloodstream and are instead excreted\nout of the body. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sesame seeds contain 18%\n<b>Selenium </b>which is an antioxidant. line-height: 150%;\">Since this fruit\nrequires dry soil, the main source of pomegranate in ancient times used to be\nAfghanistan, which was part of India. &nbsp;Pomegranates\nare drought-tolerant. In wet &nbsp;areas, they\ncan be prone to root decay from fungal diseases. They are tolerant to cold\ntemperatures as low as -13 deg C.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The flowers, leaves,\nbark, peel and the seeds of pomegranate are all edible and have potent\nmedicinal qualities. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">BABRI MASJID DEMOLITION\nVADAKAYIL</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We cannot have\ndifferent rules in India for different communities. &nbsp;We recollect the incident where Simranjit\nSingh Mann wanted to enter parliament with his sword.&nbsp; &nbsp;If so\nCoorgis can carry guns into parliament. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If so if we can convert\nto an Australian aborginee community and can welcome each other by shaking\ntheir pricks instead of hands. &nbsp;&nbsp;Or we can convert ourselves to Eskimos and do\nwife swapping merrily. &nbsp;Or we convert to some\nBantu tribe and carry bows and arrows into airplanes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Before Dharmendra and Hema Malinin &nbsp;married, they both converted to Islam, though\nthe conversion was for convenience only for Hindus are not allowed second\nmarriage. Their marriage was solemnised on 21 August 1979 in Bombay in\naccordance with Islamic rites.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While filing his\nnomination papers as a BJP candidate before the returning officer, Dharmendra\nhad written his name as Deol Dharmendra Kewal Krishn concealing his Muslim name\nDilawar Khan and wrote the name of his first wife Prakash Kaur in the\nrespective column. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When his political\nrivals brought the issue to the notice of election authorities and the general\npublic, Dharmendra lied through his teeth and denied his conversion to Islam\nand change of name. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lies in the affidavit\nsubmitted on oath to the returning officer -- is this what is expected out of\nan MP? BJP must sack Dharmendra and deny him a party ticket. &nbsp;&nbsp;Sections 420 (cheating), infringement of the\nHindu Marriage Act and Islamic Shariat law must be applied on both Dharmendra\nand Hema Malini and their properties must NOT pass on to their children..&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hema Malini too has concealed her name vide\nher &nbsp;marital status in her Rajya Sabha\nform. &nbsp;Both of them have taken refuge in\nthe political spectrum\u2014it is NOT that both are so found of the fish market\nknown as the Indian Parliament &nbsp;.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The magazine Outlook\npublished a photocopy of his Nikahnama (marriage document) which clearly said\nthat Dilawar Khan Kewal Krishn (44 years) accepted Aisha Bi R. Chakravarty (29\nyears) as his wife on 21 August 1979 at a mehr of, Rs 111,000 in the presence\nof two legal witnesses\u2026\u2019 The nikah was solemnised by Maulana Qazi Abu Talha\nMisbahi Faizabadi. . &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-8FHATgmlwYE/Ukb8ssOC9vI/AAAAAAAAmH8/icyZNVvmp4U/s1600/106_dharmendra-marriage-doc.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"520\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-8FHATgmlwYE/Ukb8ssOC9vI/AAAAAAAAmH8/icyZNVvmp4U/s640/106_dharmendra-marriage-doc.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Both the nikahnama\nand the affidavit before the returning officer state his address as Plot number\n22, Road Number 11 J.V.P.D. Scheme, Juhu, Mumbai\u2014400049. &nbsp;The nikahnama also carries details of the maulvi\nand eyewitnesses present on the occasion. A mehr of Rs 1,11,000 too is shown to\nhave been finalised between the two parties as the agreement for the nikah.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In an interview to\nOutlook , Dharmendra lied again and&nbsp; categorically\ndenied he had changed his religion. \"This allegation is totally incorrect.\nI am not the kind of man who will change his religion to suit his\ninterests.\" When asked about the Congress charges, he had asserted:\n\"If there is any truth in this charge, let someone prove it with evidence.\nIf this a lie, let the public decide.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What do you mean let\nthe public decide. &nbsp;It is the Indian\njudiciary who will decide if CHAAR SAU BISI &nbsp;has been done.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Polygamy is illegal in\nIndia for Hindus and other religious groups under the Hindu Marriage Act. It\nremains legal for Muslims under the terms of The Muslim Personal Law (Shariat)\nApplication Act of 1937, as interpreted by the All India Muslim Personal Law\nBoard.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And who are all these\nMuslim mullahs and stalwarts who interpret the Muslims personal laws. &nbsp;Are they elected in a fair manner ? &nbsp;&nbsp;It is\nbecause of these hardliners who re-interpret the Hadith as they please, that\nIslam as a religion is put in bad light.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Why do we have\nselective Islamic laws?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Koran wants the hand of\na Muslim thief to be cut off . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">If we can\nafford a Muslim TALAQ &nbsp;privelage why NOT\na chopped off hand? &nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">In future if any Muslim man with 4 wives steals-- let his hands be chopped off. &nbsp;Why cherry pick Sharia rules selectively for selfish advantage. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-hl4-lsAmT1Q/UoHdPbHv4pI/AAAAAAAAnfw/KBeCiGJ5sIY/s1600/court-convicted-Mohamed-Omar-Ismael-of-the-offence-he-committed-and-ordered-his-right-hand-amputatebfdjkd-gacan-goys-kismayo.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"481\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-hl4-lsAmT1Q/UoHdPbHv4pI/AAAAAAAAnfw/KBeCiGJ5sIY/s640/court-convicted-Mohamed-Omar-Ismael-of-the-offence-he-committed-and-ordered-his-right-hand-amputatebfdjkd-gacan-goys-kismayo.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Why are we being\nselective?</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Narendra Modi,&nbsp; the BJP Prime Ministerial candidate of the BJP\nstarted his poll campaign, calling for a Uniform Civil Code.&nbsp; India has two sets of&nbsp; Laws, General law and Personal Law.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">General law is\napplicable to all the persons who approach the Courts like the Criminal laws\nincluding the Indian Penal Code and procedural laws like the Civil Procedure\nCode, the Criminal Procedure Code and the Indian Evidence Act.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Personal laws are\nspecial laws applicable to the persons in their private family affairs like\nMarriage, Divorce, Adoption, Inheritance, Wills, Guardianship etc. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Legislature has not\ninterfered in the personal laws applicable to persons following their religion\nor the established customs and traditions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Allah does NOT &nbsp;distinguish between men and women. &nbsp;&nbsp;The self proclaimed Islamic clerics are\nignorant about what the Koran has to say on the subject of women\u2019s lives. &nbsp;&nbsp;The unelected\nMuslim Personal Law Board is not representative of all Muslims, as they have\nvery few educated women in their organization.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Muhammed the prophet\nintroduced reformist Islam and Koran to uplift women. It was NOT his intention\nto kick Muslim women on their heads.&nbsp;\nKoran &nbsp;promotes gender equality &nbsp;gave women the right to divorce, &nbsp;re-marry, &nbsp;and work.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Muslim women like Shah\nBano have NOT argued against the Koran . Rather, they only plead for their\nrights under Koran. &nbsp;Shah Bano was an old\nIndian Muslim lady then in her seventies, &nbsp;now deceased, whose affluent lawyer husband\nfamously deserted her for a younger attractive woman and then sought to rely on\ntraditional Muslim law&nbsp; to refuse any\nfurther responsibility for her welfare.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shah Bano was kicked\nout by her husband after 4 decades of &nbsp;marriage and several children. He claimed that\ngiving his old former wife the stipulated iddat money and the dower &nbsp;(haq mahr), together just a few hundred Indian\nRupees, fulfilled his legal obligations &nbsp;towards\nher, relying on traditional Muslim law to exempt himself from any further &nbsp;liability. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Well before the Shah Bano case, however, the\nincreasingly activist Indian Supreme Court had already established in a 1979\ncase that a Muslim ex-husband would only be exempt from further payments to his\nex-wife if the payments were &nbsp;sufficient\nfor her \u201cto keep body and soul together\u201d.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What does our\nConstitution say about Uniform Civil Code? In article 44, our constitution\nclearly specifies this: <i><span style=\"color: blue;\">\"The State shall endeavor to secure the citizen a\nuniform civil code through out the territory of India\".</span></i><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, in response to\nthis, there exist-</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Article 14 which guarantees the Fundamental Right of equality\nbefore law.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Article 15 which\nprohibits discrimination against any citizen on grounds only of religion, race,\ncaste, <b><span style=\"color: red;\">sex </span></b>or place of birth .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Articles 25-29\nproviding religious and cultural freedom...&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Article 13 of the\nConstitution says that all laws in force in India at the time of the\ncommencement of the constitution, if repugnant to any of the fundamental\nrights, have to cease to apply in any manner whatsoever.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Article 372 at the same\ntime requires that \"all the laws in force in the territory of India immediately\nbefore the commencement of this constitution shall continue in force therein\nuntil altered or repealed or amended by a competent legislature or other\ncompetent authority.\"<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Article 15&nbsp; requires non-discrimination based on\n\"sex\". It goes against the Indian constitution when Muslim Personal\nLaw favours the man in cases of divorce and&nbsp;\npolygamy. Equality before the law would essentially mean that Muslim\nwomen could take up to four husbands.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BR Ambedkar while\nmaking the constitution had an axe to grind with Hinduism.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Who was BR Ambedkar?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16.363636016845703px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16.363636016845703px;\">Punch into Google search-</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">CNN-IBN POLL GREATEST INDIAN SINCE MAHATMA GANDHI&nbsp;VADAKAYIL</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Muslims who are NOT a\nmajority in other countries accept uniform civil laws where they do not\nconsider this as a personal defeat whereas in India it is. &nbsp;This is the result of the vulgar secularism. In India secularism is all about vote bank\npolitics. &nbsp;Indian Muslims vote for\nMuslims candidates \u2014in general. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Is it secular to have\ndifferent laws for different religion or it is secular to have a uniform law,\nwhere all are equal ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A uniform civil code\nadministers the same set of secular civil laws to govern all people\nirrespective of their religion, caste and tribe. This supersedes the right of\ncitizens to be governed under different personal laws based on their religion\nor caste or tribe. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Such codes are in place\nin most modern nations,and in India only in Goa. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This was a sham by the\nPortuguese, &nbsp;who tried to historically delete\ntheir immoral and sadistic Goan Inquisition .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b>PORTUGUESE INQUISITION\nIN GOA ORDERED BY FRANCIS XAVIER &nbsp;VADAKAYIL</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hindus, Sikhs, Jains\nand Buddhists come under Hindu law, whereas Muslims and Christians have their\nown laws. &nbsp;Muslim law is based on the\nSharia.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Indian Mullahs try\nto cling on to power. Once an UCC comes into force, nobody will care for them.\nEven in Pakistan the 1961 Muslim Family Law Ordinance of Pakistan \"makes\nit obligatory for a man who desires to take a second wife to obtain a written\npermission from a government appointed Arbitration Council\" \u2013&nbsp; superceeding the Shariat Act of 1937. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is a shame that India has yet to learn from\nPakistan , how to protect Muslim women.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You will find moth\neaten faces like Shabana Azmi waiting in ambush like a spider, &nbsp;to hog the\nlimelight. &nbsp;Are we to assume that &nbsp;she\ndoes NOT understand all this?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Where more than 80% of\ncitizens have already been brought under codified personal law, there is no\njustification whatsoever to keep the remaining 20% in abeyance just for vote\nbanks.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now let us apply our\ncollective commonsense to find out which article of the constitution must take\npreponderence..&nbsp; &nbsp;No intelligence or literacy is required here. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is like the \u201cOrder\nof Operations \u2013 BODMAS\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But, when you see\nsomething like...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-pWIubvWoILc/UkbGyAuU9SI/AAAAAAAAmHE/NfXZU3aoR-U/s1600/images.jpghtehe.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">1 + 5 x 6 - 3 + (4 - 2)</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">... what part should\nyou calculate first? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Calculate them in the\nwrong order, and you will get a wrong answer !</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is where BODMAS kicks\nin !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">B- Brackets first<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">O- Orders (ie Powers and\nSquare Roots, etc.)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">DM- Division and\nMultiplication (left-to-right)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AS- Addition and\nSubtraction (left-to-right)<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-JE4i3A9WPLI/UkbJCpxvyDI/AAAAAAAAmHQ/S0R7MtbwvjY/s1600/BODMAS.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"216\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-JE4i3A9WPLI/UkbJCpxvyDI/AAAAAAAAmHQ/S0R7MtbwvjY/s640/BODMAS.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cSecular India\u201d must\nnot interfere in the religious matters of various communities. &nbsp;However, a reverse point can be made as well\ni.e. why should a secular India give such sweeping exemptions based on\nreligion?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Principle of secularism\nmeans that state will not discriminate against individuals on the basis of\ntheir religious beliefs or lack of it.&nbsp; &nbsp;But by instituting religion based personal\nlaws state is doing precisely that!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Is there NO\nintelligence in our law makers or judiciary? Is there NO intelligent \u201cthink\ntank\u201d?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Can we made a BODMAS to\nkick in UCC.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-U-k7FQzFJv0/UkbJxJ9JQoI/AAAAAAAAmHY/J4j6tFusDXE/s1600/images.jpgLIU;UJ.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-U-k7FQzFJv0/UkbJxJ9JQoI/AAAAAAAAmHY/J4j6tFusDXE/s1600/images.jpgLIU;UJ.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Article 44 is based on\nthe concept that there is no necessary connection between religion and personal\nlaw in a civilised society. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We must honour Article\n44 of the Constitution which states \"the State shall endeavour to secure\nfor the citizens a uniform civil code throughout the territory of India\". &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Constitution was\nmade in 1950, and 64 years had passed since it was promulgated, but Article 44\nhad been totally ignored by vested politicians\u2014eager to appease Muslims for\nvote bank politics .&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">We must have one common\ncriminal law in india. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Article 25 guarantees\nreligious freedom whereas Article 44 seeks to divest religion from social\nrelations and personal law. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Marriage, succession\nand like matters of a secular character cannot be brought within the guarantee\nenshrined under Articles 25, 26 and 27.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Everybody knows that Shoaib Malik left his first\nwife Ayesha Siddiqui &nbsp;just because she\nbecame fat.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Like the mullahs seem\nto be trying to convey, UCC&nbsp; does not\ninsist people from one religion to start practicing rituals of other religions. &nbsp;All it says is, with changing living styles along with the time, there should\nbe a uniform civil code irrespective of all religions as far as social ethics\nare concerned.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hindus have accepted\nchanges in their personal&nbsp; laws with\ngrace.&nbsp; Child marriages were banned, Sati\nwas banned, widow re-marriage was encouraged, divorce was introduced, inheritance\nlaws were amended and Hindus accepted all these changes. They never complained\nof hurting their religious sentiments like the Muslims.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Muslims in other\ncountries , where they are in minority accept uniform civil laws where they do\nnot consider this as a great defeat whereas in India it is. &nbsp;This is the result of the vulgar vote bank\npolitics.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During independence in 1947, all hardcore Indian Muslims were given\nthe free option of going to Pakistan. &nbsp;It\nis NOT that they were never given a choice.&nbsp;\nThese people who decided to stay back in India and now crying hoarse\nabout UCC as an attempt &nbsp;to destroy \u201cMuslim\nIdentity\u201d. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The vast majority of Muslims\nled by the Jumiat al-Ulama and other orthodox Muslim groups have fought tooth\nand nail against any change to the Personal Law, and this includes educated Indian\nMuslims too.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All this is despite Muslims being pampered and allowed to go on Haj\npilgrimage with government subsidy with taxes paid by majority Hindus. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That \u201cSecular India\u201d must\nnot interfere in the religious matters of various communities is pure nonsense. &nbsp;Secular India must NOT give such sweeping exemptions based on religion, when a\nMuslim man can marry four times , while men of other religions will be thrown\ninto jail . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A uniform civil code\ndoesn\u2019t mean it will limit the freedom of people to follow their religion, it\njust means that every person will be treated the same. &nbsp;This is the meaning of secularism, NOT\nmajority bashing or proving that majority is always wrong. . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All the laws related to marriage, inheritance,\nfamily, land etc. should be equal for all Indians. &nbsp;This is the only way to ensure that all\nIndians are treated same.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Islamic divorce is to be pronounced thrice\nafter each menstrual period called \u201cTuhrs\u201d. &nbsp;Repudiation must not take place during\nmenstruation. &nbsp;This provides enough time for\nrelatives to come from far off places , to intervene, counsel and protect the\ninterests of the helpless wife and children. &nbsp;In most of the Muslim countries divorce has\nbeen made a judicial act. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; But in India Khula has no legal sanction.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Islam does NOT permit\npolygamy unconditionally. &nbsp;It is allowed only\nwhen it helps the new woman and it is\nmore to help orphan girls and helpless widows.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sameer Ali in his\n\u201cSpirit of Is\u00adlam\u201d, says, \u201cYou may marry two, three, or four wives, but not\nmore\u201d. , serif;\">Article 370 of the Indian constitution is an article that grants special autonomous status to the state of Jammu and Kashmir.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The article is drafted in Part XXI of the Constitution: Temporary, Transitional and Special Provisions.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The State's Constituent Assembly was empowered to recommend the articles of the Indian constitution to be applied to the state or to abrogate the Article 370 altogether.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">After the state Constituent Assembly dissolved itself without recommending abrogation, the Article 370 was deemed to have become a permanent feature of the Indian Constitution.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE ELECTIONS TO THE JAMMU AND KASHMIR ASSEMBLY IN 1951 WERE RIGGED.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">They exploited Article 370, and adopted Sections 6, 8 and 9 for incorporation in the Constitution under which the State was to be governed in the future.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Kashmir and which sections will not.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">PARAMOUNT CLAUSE: \" ETHNIC CLEANSING \" - OF SIX LAKHS KASHMIRI PANDITS BY KASHMIRI MUSLIMS SUPPORTED BY PAKISTAN, MAKES ARTICLE 370 NULL AND VOID\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; Kashmir through the Constitution (Application to Jammu &amp; Kashmir) Order, May 1954.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Armed with absolute power, the Jammu &amp; Kashmir Constituent Assembly adopted Section 6 which said no persons who had crossed over to the state after May 1944 will be considered eligible for citizenship rights.</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Article 19, for example, says that \u201cAll citizens shall have the right (a) to freedom of speech and expression, (b) to assemble peacefully and without arms, (c) to form associations or unions, (d) to move freely throughout the territory of India, (e) to reside and settle in any part of the territory of India; (f) to acquire, hold and dispose of property; and (g) to practice any profession, or to carry on any occupation, trade or business\u201d.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">It follows that what is needed is not just the abrogation of Article 370 but also the revocation of Article 35A. , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In October 2015, the High Court of Jammu and Kashmir has ruled that the Article 370 cannot be \"abrogated, repealed or even amended.\"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">It explained that the clause (3) of the Article conferred power to the State's Constituent Assembly to recommend to the President on the matter of the repeal of the Article.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Since the Constituent Assembly did not make such a recommendation before its dissolution in 1957, the Article 370 has taken on the features of a \"permanent provision\" despite being titled a temporary provision in the Constitution.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">BALLS !</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHAT IS DONE BY DECEIT IS \" NULL AND VOID \"..</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Article 35A came into existence by a Presidential Order passed by Dr. Rajandra Prasad ( Rothschild sponsored FAKE Kayastha ) on the advice of Nehru\u2019s cabinet in 1954...</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">President of India has sole legislative power under article 123 power to make ordinance when either house of the Parliament is not in session.&nbsp;</span><div>\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">- This legislative powers of the President has an EXPIRY SHELL PERIOD OF MERE SIX MONTHS....</span></span><br />\n<div>\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Constitution can be amended only by the Parliament as per procedure clearly laid out in Article 368. but Article 35A was never presented before the Parliament of India\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">This effectively means, in this case, the President bypassed the amending procedure as laid out in the Constitution of India in order to add the new Article 35A\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">This also means that Article 368 of the Constitution, in its application to Jammu and Kashmir, also got amended!..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The President of India does not have legislative power, but here in this case he performed the function of Parliament!..</span><br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">Article 35A appears in the Constitution as an appendix\u2026How can an Article, which has been implemented on the ground as if it\u2019s a part of the Constitution, be missing from the text of the Constitution ?</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Article 35A was an amendment in our Constitution via the back door (Presidential order), without the involvement of India\u2019s Parliament\u2026</span><div>\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Article 35A is an example of the abuse of Article 370.&nbsp; &nbsp;Article 35A is a violation of the basic structure of our Constitution.&nbsp; &nbsp; Article 35A spawned a set of laws that were discriminatory in nature. ..</span></span><br />\n<div>\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">It curbs certain basic rights enshrined in the very Preamble of the Constitution. A Kashmiri woman marrying a non-permanent resident or outsider loses all succession rights, while a Kashmiri man does not.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">As a result of the implementation of Article 35A,.lakhs of Indian HINDU citizens have been deprived of \u201c JUSTICE, social, economic and political \u201d and \u201c EQUALITY of status and of opportunity \u201d...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In the laws under Article 370 read with Article 35A even the President of India may be denied a place or land for official purpose. This is a breach of trust\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED TO 4--</span><br />\n<br />\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_196MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_196BR\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_196B_box\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_197B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6985590787369165189\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_197M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_24.html?showComment=1522142909202#c6985590787369165189\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 27, 2018 at 2:58 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_197MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2--<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nDemocratic India cannot allow any section of its population to be treated as second-rate citizens in any part of the country.<br />\n<br />\nArticle 368 is the only way to amend the Constitution,.. Not the President.<br />\n<br />\nThe marginal note of Article 368 states; \u201c Power of the Parliament to amend the Constitution and procedure, therefore \u201d.. Which means it is the Parliament that has the power to amend the Constitution.<br />\n<br />\nSub-clause 2 of the Article 368 states that: --<br />\n\u201c An amendment of this Constitution may be initiated only by the introduction of a Bill for the purpose in either House of Parliament, and when the Bill is passed in each House by majority of not less than two-third of the members of that House present and voting, [it shall be presented to the President who shall give his assent to the Bill and thereupon] the Constitution shall stand amended in accordance with the terms of Bill...\"<br />\n<br />\nThe President of India does NOT have the sole UNBRIDLED power to amend the constitution through the bypass of the entire Constitutional mechanism nor does Article 370 give power to the President to insert any Article in any Part of the Constitution....<br />\n<br />\nThe parliamentary route of lawmaking was bypassed when the President incorporated Article 35A into the Constitution. Article 368 (i) of the Constitution empowers only Parliament to amend the Constitution. The President acted outside his jurisdiction.. Article 35A is void because the Nehru government did not place it before Parliament for discussion..<br />\n<br />\nArticle 370 grants special status to Jammu and Kashmir, while Article 35A empowers the state legislature to define permanent citizens.<br />\n<br />\nArticle 370 and Article 35A of the Indian Constitution are an \"unnecessary baggage\" of the past and hence these laws be repealed..<br />\n<br />\nRestricting citizens from other States from getting employment or buying property within Jammu and Kashmir is a violation of fundamental rights under Articles 14, 19 and 21 of the Constitution\u2026<br />\n<br />\nArticle 370 (along with Article 35A) is an anachronistic decree that has outlived its utility, militates against India\u2019s sovereignty, and discriminates against both Indians and Kashmiris by mutually excluding each other from syncretic growth. It is redundant, and constitutionally discarded into the dustbin of history.<br />\n<br />\nTHE TERM \" SUBJUDIDE \" DOES NOT APPLY TO INDIA.. AS WE DON\u2019T HAVE A JURY SYSTEM..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/11/altamas-kabir-worst-chief-justice-of.html</span><br />\n<br />\nWE DON\u2019T WANT THIS LOOPHOLE TO BE USED BY IDIOTS\u2026<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_197B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div>\n<br /></div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_198b+seedyIoD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c131902465790846184\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_89M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">MOKSHA FOR JAYA AND\nVIJAYA ,&nbsp; </span><span style=\"color: blue;\">RUKMINI WIFE OF 8<sup>TH</sup> VISHNU\nAVATAR LORD KRISHNA</span><span style=\"color: red;\"> , </span><span style=\"color: magenta;\">SHALVA , </span><span style=\"color: red;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: purple;\">RUKMI </span><span style=\"color: red;\">, </span>VIDHURATHA</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\">\n\u2013 &nbsp;CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-njGuoVPSuVw/UkHNKhiqZHI/AAAAAAAAmCw/XpAfZRHB4HA/s1600/rukmini-haran.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em;
