Negative thoughts and emotions can\ninterfere with the electromagnetic, biophoton signaling at the cellular\nmembrane and DNA levels. <o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWhen this happens, the communication signals become chaotic\nand cellular information and instructions for enzyme and protein formation\nbecome blocked. <o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe same thing happens when you are trying to get a clear\npicture on your television set. XIV, 110.47).<br /><br />The Law Code of Manu mentions the Rig Veda many times, but the Rig Veda did not mention the Law Code of Manu even once.<br /><br />MANU WAS A SAGE FROM ARYAVARTA..<br /><br />This is because Rig Veda went of oral route for 330 centuries before being penned down 70 centuries ago.. Manu made his laws 10,300 years ago.<br /><br />The Law Code of Manu does not just mention the Rig Veda only in passing, but as the cornerstone of its civilization's philosophical and spiritual thought.<br /><br />HAMMURABI LIFTED HIS LAWS WHOLE SALE FROM THE LAWS OF MANU ..<br /><br />capt ajit vadakayil<br />..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c2594440602899249531\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div>\n<br /></div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Harshil Shah<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">September 21, 2014 at\n9:06 AM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pranam Guruji,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Indeed, i read the\nabove post and its exactly same. CLASSMATES OF MAO AT MOSCOW LENIN\nSCHOOL POL POT AND HO CHI MINH,&nbsp; THE FAKE\nGREAT MARCH AND FAKE BATTLE AT LUNDING BRIDGE TO MAKE MAO TSE TUNG A LIVING\nLEGEND AND INSTANT HERO LIKE ROTHSCHILD STOOGES HERO STALIN AND HERO CHURCHILL ,\n&nbsp;&nbsp;MAO\u2019S\nFAKE LITTLE RED BOOK WRITTEN BY JEWS,&nbsp;\nCHINESE JEWS ATTENDING BILDERBERG MEET, &nbsp;&nbsp;ROTHSHILD\u2019S\nGLOBAL WARMING HOAX SIDEKICK MAURICE F STRONG AND CHINAMAN DENG XIAOPING\nCONNECTION &nbsp;VIA JEWESS ANNA LOUISE STRONG\n, &nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; JEWISH MASONRY BNAI\nBRITH, &nbsp;5 POINTED RED STAR AND 5\nROTHSCHILD BROTHERS,&nbsp; FREEMASONS SUN YAT\nSEN AND CHIANG KAI SHEK, &nbsp;ROTHSCHILD\u2019S OPIUM\nAGENT SOONG FAMILY WHO CONTROLLED THE LAST EMPEROR, &nbsp;&nbsp;FRENCH\nROTHSCHILD EDUCATED CHINESE PERESTROIKA STOOGE DENG XIAOPING, &nbsp;COMMUNISM A\nROTHSCHILD CREATION , &nbsp;INDIAN COMMUNIST\nFOUNDER MN ROY AND HIS JEWISH WIFE EVEYLN TRENT , &nbsp;PERESTROIKA TRIGGER MEN DENG\nAND GORBACHEV TIME MAGAZINE\u2019S MEN OF THE YEAR TWICE</b> -&nbsp; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-xXag99ut97Q/UiAp_oCEt-I/AAAAAAAAld0/_oB1tX3UsyY/s1600/mao_kissinger.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To get a hang of what I\nplan to write in this post, you must first see a video movie\u2014 about Rothschild\u2019s\ncommunist revolutions all over the world.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Watch the video on \"Youtube mode\" &nbsp;by clicking on Youtube at bottom right hand side. &nbsp;MAKE SURE YOU TURN ON THE ENGLISH SUBTITLES (\nCAPTIONS, the first button on right hand side bottom of the Youtube video &nbsp;)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://img.youtube.com/vi/rdXZ9c55Nn8/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://youtube.googleapis.com/v/rdXZ9c55Nn8&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://youtube.googleapis.com/v/rdXZ9c55Nn8&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Communism requires that\nall means of production be controlled by the Jewish BIG BROTHER remote\ncontrolled state.&nbsp; In other words, no one\ncan own his or her own business or produce his or her own goods because the\nstate owns everything. <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>In the novel Animal\nfarm, Snowball is chased out of the farm by PIG Napoleon\u2019s vicious guard\ndogs.&nbsp; After that Napoleon blames his\nerstwhile colleague and hatchet man Snowball for all the problems on the\nfarm,&nbsp; and he alludes that Snowball was a\nJones stooge .<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Snowball had fought\nbravely at the Battle of Cowshed. Now all are brainwashed into believing that\nhe was a double agent , actually fighting for&nbsp;\nJones and the shot wounds he sustained are made out to be wounds\nNapoleon inflicted on him. Those accused of supporting Snowball are purged and\nexecuted after being forced to confess , and a reward is offered for Snowball\u2019s\ncapture.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Napoleon takes nine\npuppies from their parents and begins raising them himself with ulterior\nmotives.&nbsp; No one knows exactly what he is\ndoing until the dogs suddenly appear,&nbsp;\nfully grown, to chase Snowball off the farm.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>After Snowball is\nexiled, Napoleon is in complete dictatorial control of the farm\u2014no more\ncharades.&nbsp; He speaks relatively little\nbecause he has Squealer do all his speaking for him.&nbsp; He eliminates all chance of open protest when\nhe bans public meetings,&nbsp; saying that it\nis better if things are decided by committees, which will be presided over by\nNapoleon himself.&nbsp; In general his public\nimage is very tightly controlled.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Later Napoleon rarely\nappeared in public, but spent all his time as the unseen monarch in the\nfarmhouse, which was guarded at each door by fierce-looking dogs.&nbsp; When he did emerge, it was in a pompous\nceremonial manner, with an escort of six dogs who closely surrounded him and\ngrowled viciously if anyone ventured too close.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Napoleon protects\nhimself on all fronts and loopholes.&nbsp;\nWith the help of Squealer and the other pigs, he re-writes history,&nbsp; turning Snowball into a villain, and\nincreasing his own zilch role in the Rebellion.&nbsp;\nHe relies on the gullibility of the strongest animals, like Boxer the\nhorse, and the apathy of the wisest, like Benjamin the donkey. When anyone\nquestions Napoleon's cooked up version of history,&nbsp; he has a herd of sheep chant loudly over\ntheir protests, drowing it out.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Napoleon is Rothschild\nstooge STALIN / MAO -- General Secretary of the Communist Party. Masters &nbsp;of manipulation and a spin doctors of the\nhighest pedigree. They would &nbsp;pull\nstrings from behind the scenes. The dogs are KGB and secret police.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>to ensure his own vice\ngrip on power, Napoleon uses his attack dogs to get rid of every opposition by\nforce. At the same time that he quiets dissent and manufactures his public\nimage through Squealer and the bleating sheep.&nbsp;\nOne of the biggest parallels between Napoleon and <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Stalin has to do with\nthe way Animal Farm\u2019s productivity slumps off while Napoleon is in\ncontrol.&nbsp; He decides to fill the\ngranaries with sand to hide the smaller harvest.&nbsp; This episode is an allusion to how Stalin\ndisrupted agricultural production with his Five-Year-Plans (begun in 1928).\nWhen the Plans resulted in widespread famine across Russia, Stalin did his best\nto conceal coverage of the famines and to make it look like Russia was doing as\nwell as before.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Napoleon\u2019s was cunning\nand shrewd.&nbsp; Animal Farm is a machine\nthat runs according to PIG Napoleon\u2019s iron will.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>We get hints of\nNapoleon\u2019s ruthless Stalin type nature long before it erupts into full force.\nThe first comes when he unleashes the dogs on Snowball, and they chase him out\nof the farm. The second comes when Napoleon squashes the hen rebellion by\ncutting off their food rations, causing a number of hens to die of starvation.\nBut nothing measures up to what he does next.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Napoleon begins to\ndemand that various animals come forward and make false confessions before the\ngroup.&nbsp; He gets rid of anyone that had\nthe power and means to contradict him, and after they reveal themselves as\ntraitors, \u201cthe dogs promptly tore their throats out\u201d . In this way, <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Napoleon knocks off the\nfour pigs who sometimes agreed to disagree with him, and the hens who acted as\nringleaders in the rebellion.</span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Quote\u201d And so the tale\nof confessions and executions went on, until there was a pile of corpses lying\nbefore Napoleon\u2019s feet and the air was heavy with the smell of blood, which had\nbeen unknown there since the time of Jones \u201c Unquote.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>The violence that\nerupts mid-way through Orwell\u2019s \"Fairy Tale,\" is an allusion to the\nGreat Purge, also known as the Great Red Terror, which was overseen by Stalin\nin the late 1930s. Pig Napoleon\u2019s methods mirror Stalin\u2019s own quite closely. <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Some people would just\ndisappear; others were sent to the Gulag prison camps; others were arm twisted\n( by kidnapping their children ) to discredit themselves publicly by confessing\nto crimes they had never committed.&nbsp; All\nof these extreme methods were ways for Stalin to consolidate his power, to make\nsure that his position was unshakeable.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>What is so diabolical\nabout Napoleon\u2019s method is that he forces such animals to tell lies about\nthemselves before they die.&nbsp; And dead men\nnay animals tell no tales. By robbing their right to free speech, he forces the\nanimals to essentially kill any public respect or self respect they might have\nhad.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Both Napoleon and\nStalin were dictators.&nbsp; Fuelled and\ndriven by paranoia&nbsp; cum sheer love for\nviolence.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>To make sure all of\nthis floats with the other animals, Napoleon cleverly keeps doctoring the\nCommandments to make them say what he wants them to say.&nbsp; Squealer explains that the commandment didn\u2019t\nsay that you couldn\u2019t sleep in a bed, only that you couldn\u2019t sleep in a bed\nwith sheets.&nbsp; Similarly, the commandment\nforbidding alcohol later forbids drinking alcohol to excess.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Meanwhile, Napoleon\ndenounces all the grand social dreams that gave birth to the idea of Animal\nFarm.&nbsp; He tells the other animals: \u201cthe\ntruest happiness lay in working hard and living frugally\u201d . In other words,\nNapoleon has taken the idea of prosperous living and kept it all for\nhimself.&nbsp; Everyone else is out on their\nown.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>It\u2019s clear that\nNapoleon has made a mockery of Old Major\u2019s ideas in the same way that Stalin\nmade a mockery of Karl Marx\u2019s ideas. The \"worker's state\" that\nactually existed under Stalin was more like a horrible, dark parody of what\nMarx thought a communist state would be. <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>In fact, it looked a\nwhole lot like fascism&nbsp; (theoretically\nthe opposite of communism).&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>What Orwell seems to be\nsaying with Napoleon the pig ( Stalin / Mao ) is this: \"Hey Jew Marx, didn\u2019t\nyou notice how the French Revolution ended?\"<o:p></o:p></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now about Rothschild\u2019s\ncreation, our own crypto Jews , the Chitpavan Brahmins. &nbsp;&nbsp;These\nJews were from Calicut ( &nbsp;Bene Israeli run\nJoota Angadi , which is still named after them ) . &nbsp;They sold black fish frying ware which even\ntoday is called CHEENA CHATTI. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They were taken and\ndumped on the beach of Kolaba ,Konkan &nbsp;on\nRothschild\u2019s British East India Company ship and told to pretend that they were\nship wrecked . &nbsp;When the locals found\nthem on the water edge of the sea shore they called them chitpavan&nbsp; in their dialect meaning \u201cfound on sea shore\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After results of DNA\nanalysis on Bene Israel linking them to a Jewish tribe were announced in the\nTimes of India, about 15,000 of the 20,000 Bene Israel migrated back to Israel\nwhere they still dress in Indian clothes and play cricket.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I have seen them in Tel\nAviv , Ashod and Haifa.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A girl used to visit my\nship hoping to get an Indian sailor husband, and she used to come to my cabin\nevery time, coming along with the Jew agent ,&nbsp;\nin whose agency she worked. &nbsp;She\nsorely missed India&nbsp; and Mumbai in particular.\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One day I told the attractive girl in her\nface &nbsp;\u201c What you want to leave the\npromised land, the land of the chosen people , the land of milk and honey ? \u201d &nbsp;By the way Madhuri Dixit is Chitpavan.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BR Ambedkar the stooge\nof Rothschild married a Chitpavan Brahmin though he hated all Brahmins.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothchild made sure\nthat the Chitpavan brahmins were sponsored by scholarships and became lawyers, judges ,\nprofessors , journalists , high ranking administrators .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Social reformed\nMaharishi Karve was Chitpavan.&nbsp; Historian\nand media owner Bal Gangadhara Tilak was Chitpavan. &nbsp;I know this will surprise 99.99% Indians. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Let me digress-<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The Government of India\nawarded </span><b><span style=\"color: red;\">Chitpavan Brahmin Maharishi Dhondo Keshav Karve</span></b><span style=\"color: blue;\"> its highest civilian\naward, the Bharat Ratna, in 1958. &nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: small;\">In\n1920, Rothschild agent and &nbsp;industrialist\nfrom Mumbai, </span><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">SIR</span></b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: small;\"> Vithaldas Thackersey, donated Karve's university 15 lakhs Indian\nrupees\u2014 an ASTRONOMICAL &nbsp;sum in those\ndays\u2014and the university was then renamed Shreemati N\u0101thib\u0101i D\u0101modar Th\u0101ckersey\n(SNDT) Indian Women\u2019s University. <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Bharat Ratna was given\nto Maharshi Dhondo Keshav Karve, because he worked overtime to provide shelter\nto destitute Indian women.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">In1929, Karve was\nsponsored by Rothschild on a 15 month world tour. EVR Periyar was also given\nsuch a conducted world tour, but only where Tamils existed. &nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Karve met prominent &nbsp;European and American Jews all over the\nworld.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">In England he was facilitated at\nRothschild\u2019s India Association at Caxton Hall, London. &nbsp;He went to Switzerland , Germany, USA, Japan, During\na subsequent tour of America, Karve lectured at various forums on women's\neducation and social reforms in India.&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">He returned to India in April 1930. &nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">With a few months he was sent again to Africa for\nanother 15 month tour wherever Indian indentured labour existed- &nbsp;Kenya, Uganda, Tanzania, Zanzibar, Portuguese\nEast Africa, South Africa etc.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>Durga Bhagwat ( one of\nthe most respected women of integrity in India ) has written a damning\nindictment of Maharishi Karve, alleging that he--</b></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>-- \u201c preyed on young attractive\nwomen who were vulnerable, facing hard times, and tried to put them under debt\nof gratitude so that they would be drawn into his coterie for life, looking\nheartlessly upon them as possible recruits in his social mission \u201c.&nbsp;</b></span></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Durga was a\nreal Durga as she had refused to accept bullsh#it honors like Padma Shree and\nJnanapeeth. &nbsp;She was a very attractive woman in her young age-- never married.</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But Tilak was the man who pushed the story\nthat the white man wrote our Vedas and Aryan invasion was inwards . &nbsp;Read his book \u201c Artic home of the Vedas \u201c &nbsp;&nbsp;written\nin conjunction with German Jew and historian Max Muller, while he was in jail (\nsic!).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chitpavan brahmin Justice\nRanade was the founding member of Indian National Congress the stooge organization\nof Rothschild \u2013 all filled with pseudo freedom fighters.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Y chromosome of\nChitpavan brahmins contains a Cohenim haplotype unique to Rabbis.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Veer Vinayak Savarkar\nin a statement issued on 19 December 1947, &nbsp;dancing to Rothschild\u2019s tune, expressed joy at\nthe recognition of the claim of Jewish people to establish an independent\nJewish state, and likened the event to the glorious day on which Moses led them\nout of Egyptian bondage.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Veer Vinayak Savarkar&nbsp;considered\nthat justice demanded restoration of entire Palestine to the Jews, their\nhistorical holy land and fatherland. &nbsp;He regretted\nIndia's vote at the United Nations Organisation against the creation of the\nJewish state terming it a policy of appeasement of Muslims.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothschild stooge Gandhi\nchapter was also ended by a chitpavan brahmin, Naturam Godse. &nbsp;Veer Vinayak Savarkar on a plea bargain with\nRothschild was also a chitpavan Brahmin.&nbsp;\nGandhi was handled by Churchill whose mother Jenny Jerome is Rothschild.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vaman Sivaram Apte the\nSanskrit scholar who had access to our original Sanskrit Hindu scriptures &nbsp;and Shivram Mahadev Paranjape the editor of\nMarathi weekly kaal were chitpavan brahmins.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These Indian Bene\nIsrael party who went skippety skip to the promised land faced severe racial discrimination\n, just because their skin was darker. &nbsp;In\nthe Indian Parliament, a debate upon discrimination against Indian Jews in\nIsrael took place . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On Sept. 8, 1952, a\nstatement of the Indian deputy minister for external affairs, Shri Anil R.\nChanda, was read in answer to a question in the Indian Council of States in New\nDelhi, as follows: <i>\"The government\nof India has received complaints from some Indian Jews who had returned from\nIsrael that there was discrimination against them on account of their color.\nThe government has not verified any of these complaints, and in any event, such\nindividual complaints do not justify a general statement that there is a color\nbar in Israel</i>.\" &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Although the Chief\nRabbinate had laid down in essence that \"the sect of the Bene Israel in\nIndia is of the seed of the House of Israel without any doubt,\" several\nrabbis in Israel refused to marry Bene Israel to other Jews.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">On Oct. 18, 1962, the council of the Chief\nRabbinate decided that marriage with Bene Israel is permissible. However, the\nrabbi registering the marriage was bound to investigate, as far back as three\ngenerations at least, the maternal ancestry of every applicant of the Bene\nIsrael, man or woman, wishing to marry outside the community, in order to\nestablish to what extent there were not intermixed in the family persons who\nwere non-Jews or proselytes.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The prime minister,\nLevi Eshkol, issued a statement in 1964 after a general strike by Bene\nIsraelis &nbsp;claiming racial profiling &nbsp;--\"the government of Israel\nreiterates that it regards the community of the Bene Israel from India as Jews\nin every respect, without any restriction or distinction, equal in their rights\nto all other Jews in every matter, including matters of matrimony.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">As a result of natural\nincrease, the Bene Israel in Israel number over 50,000. They tend to live in\nwell-defined ghetto type communities such as Dimona, Ashdod, Yeru\u1e25am, Kiryat\nGat, and Lydda (Lod). There are large communities in Ashkelon, Beersheba,\nRamleh, and Kiryat Ata. Mon. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">A Marathi\nquarterly called Mai Bolli has been published in Israel since 1989.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Hagada\"\nindicates that Judaism can only be transmitted to children of a mixed marriage through\nthe mother, that is to say, when the mother is a Jewess. &nbsp;But this orthodox \"Hagada\" law has\nbeen over ruled by many Israelite communities, the reformists among others, who\nalso accept as Jews the children of Jewish father and a Gentile mother.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; The \"peace treaty\" included the following\nprovisions:-</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>*Full legalization of\nthe opium trade in China,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>*Compensation from the\nopium stockpiles confiscated by Lin of 2 million pounds,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>*Territorial\nsovereignty for the British Crown over two hundred offshore islands.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>*Sassoon's monopoly\nrights to distribute opium in port cities. </i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pretty soon Rothschild\nwanted the &nbsp;right to sell opium\nthroughout the nation. The Manchus resisted and the British Army again attacked\nin the \"Second Opium War\" fought 1858 \u2013 1860. The British besieged\nPeking using their mercenary army paid by Rothschild. . When the city fell,\nBritish commander Lord Elgin, ordered the temples in the city sacked and burned\nto the ground as a show of comtempt. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In\nthe new \"Peace Treaty\" of October 25, 1860, the British were assigned\nrights to a vastly expanded opium trade covering seven- eights of China, which\nbrought in over 20 million pounds in 1864 alone. &nbsp;In that year, the Sassoons imported 58,681\nchests of opium and by 1880 it skyrocketed to 105,508 chests, making the Rotshchild\na rich Jew.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">England was given the\nHong Kong peninsula as a colony and large sections of Amoy, Canton, Foochow,\nNingpo and Shanghai. The Sassoons were now licensing opium dens in each British\noccupied area with large fees being collected by their Jewish agents. &nbsp;Rothschild ensured that no other race could\nengage in \"the Jews' business\". &nbsp;However, the British government would not\nallow any opium to be imported into Europe! &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sir Albert Sassoon, the\neldest of David Sassoon's sons took over the family empire, constructing huge\ntextile mills in Bombay where he paid slave labor wages. &nbsp;This expansion continued after World War One,\nputting England's mills in Lancashire out of business. Thousands lost their\njobs. This did not deter Queen Victoria from knighting Albert Sassoon in 1872.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Solomon Sassoon moved\nto Hong Kong and ran the family business there until his death in 1894.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Later,\nthe entire family moved to England because with modern communications they\ncould operate their financial empire from their luxurious estates in London and\nsocialize with royalty. Edward Albert. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Queen also knighted\nEdward Sassoon . &nbsp;All of David Sassoon's\nfourteen grandsons were made high ranking officers during World War One, to\navoid combat. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">US President Jew Franklin\nD. , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">DOCTOR DEATH SHIRO\nISHII, EMPEROR HIROHITO AND QUID PRO QUO VADAKAYIL</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">How many Chinese know\ntoday that Chiang Kai Shek was sent to Japan in 1907 by Rothschild for training at the Tokyo\nShinbu Gakko , an Imperial Japanese Army Academy Preparatory School for Chinese\nstudents?</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was there that\nRothschild\u2019s agents brainwashed Chiang Kai Shek to overthrow the Qing Dynasty\nand to set up a Chinese republic.&nbsp; He was\nintroduced to his fellow&nbsp; Zhejiang native\nChen Qimei, and, in 1908, Chen brought Chiang into the Tongmenghui, a precursor\nof the Kuomintang (KMT) organization.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">How many of you know that Chiang Kai Shek served in the Imperial\nJapanese Army from 1909 to 1911 ?</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hirohito also knew his\ninvasion and occupation of China would precipitate the defeat of Chiang\nKai-shek\u2019s Chinese nationalist government, by the Jew controlled Chinese\nCommunist Party; and it was first and foremost a \u201cmanaged conflict\u201d between the\nChinese and Japanese on Jew controlled macro-economic lines.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothschild stuck the\nproverbial knife in the back of Chiang Kai Shek while empowering their\nCommunist stooge leader Mao Tse Tung after WW II. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Secretary of State and\nRothchild stooge General George Marshall intervened on &nbsp;three occasions when Chiang\u2019s Nationalist forces\nwere on the verge of defeating Mao\u2019s Communist forces by imposing a Cease-Fire.\n&nbsp;On each occasion, the Cease-Fire bought\nMao much needed time to regroup and re-arm. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothschild &nbsp;double-crossed Chiang Jai Shek to prop up &nbsp;Communist Mao.&nbsp;\nRothschild agents who worked in the U.S. Treasury Department, Jew Solomon\nAdler and Jew Harry Dexter White, deliberately engineered Chiang Kai-shek\u2019s\ndownfall by sabotaging the Chinese currency, paving the way for Mao and\ncommunism. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On October 1, 1949, Mao\nZedong proclaimed the People\u2019s Republic of China \u201cCommunist China\u201d or \u201cRed\nChina\u201d kicking out &nbsp;Chiang Kai-shek ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chiang had sent his\neldest son, Ching-kuo, to study in Russia. &nbsp;Rothschild made sure he was kept hostage to\ntwist Chiang Kai Shek\u2019s arm , when ever he wanted, to make sure Mao's LONG MARCH had secret shortcuts and was a success.&nbsp; After his father's split from the First\nUnited Front in 1927, son Ching-kuo was forced to stay there, as a hostage, until\n1937. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, Mao\u2019s \u201cGreat\nLeap Forward\u201d&nbsp; killed approximately 60\nMillion of his own people with starvation, forced labor, and execution In fact\nMao and his \u201cLittle Red Book\u201d are responsible for more deaths&nbsp;&nbsp; and misery over the long term than anyone\nelse in history.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After the 1949 Chinese\nRevolution, Chiang Kai-Shek and army retreated to Taiwan.&nbsp; Chiang ruled the island securely as President\nof the Republic of China and General of the Kuomintang until his death in 1975.\nHe ruled mainland China for 22 years, and Taiwan for 30 years.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">Where words come out\nfrom the depth of truth;<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">Where tireless striving\nstretches its arms towards perfection;<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">Where the mind is led\nforward by thee into ever-widening thought and action---<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><i>Into that heaven of\nfreedom, my Father, let my country awake.</i><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">This poem is\nincongruent to Rabindranath Tagore\u2019s style of poetry.&nbsp; It stands out like a sore thumb from the rest\nof his poetry\u2014 and this is the style of </span><span style=\"color: red;\"><b>William Butler Yeats&nbsp;.</b></span><span style=\"color: purple;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-OPhAJAnYczc/UiZBWCTMjEI/AAAAAAAAliM/3pEclRK0KSc/s1600/yb+yeats.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"208\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-OPhAJAnYczc/UiZBWCTMjEI/AAAAAAAAliM/3pEclRK0KSc/s320/yb+yeats.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">It is said that this\nsmall Bengali poem appeared in the volume Naivedya (July 1901)\u2014all bull.&nbsp; This small poem first appeared as poem 35 in\nthe English Gitanjali, published by the India Society, London, in 1912.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">German Jew\nRothschild\u2019s&nbsp; agent </span><span style=\"color: red;\"><b>German Jew William\nRothenstein</b></span><span style=\"color: purple;\"> too Rabindranath Tagore with him to London in 1912..&nbsp; Tagore stayed in Rothenstein\u2019s home. <o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-sr69pYzd4VM/UiZBIbeyAWI/AAAAAAAAliE/6l7NmAa2ob8/s1600/William_Rothenstein_photo_by_George_Charles_Beresford_1920.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-sr69pYzd4VM/UiZBIbeyAWI/AAAAAAAAliE/6l7NmAa2ob8/s1600/William_Rothenstein_photo_by_George_Charles_Beresford_1920.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">In 1917, Tagore read\nout the English version, (then titled 'Indian Prayer') at the Indian National\nCongress session in Calcutta on request from Rothschild. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Tagore lost his poems\nin London on the Northern Line; but he \u201cmanaged\u201d to retrieve it from Lost\nProperty thanks to his Jew host.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">SIR William Rothenstein\ncalled Yeats to meet Rabindranath Tagore to Yeats on 27th June 1912 Yeats and\nTagore then set to work together editing the list of poems . Yeats wrote a\nstirring introduction for Gitanjali\u2014why NOT ?&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">He was also neck deep in this work. Gitanjali, originally published by\nthe India Society, was quickly taken up by Macmillan, Yeats\u2019s publisher. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">American </span><span style=\"color: red;\"><b>Ezra Weston\nLoomis Pound </b></span><span style=\"color: purple;\">, a Rothschild\u2019s peer review agent was a kingmaker when it came to\npoets and writer.&nbsp; He is the popshot who\nmade&nbsp; T. S. Eliot, James Joyce, Robert\nFrost ,Ernest Hemingway etc famous.<o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-9-WR_Mde2jM/UiZB5IiKgWI/AAAAAAAAliU/9FofRRU8c-s/s1600/download.jpgerza+pound.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-9-WR_Mde2jM/UiZB5IiKgWI/AAAAAAAAliU/9FofRRU8c-s/s320/download.jpgerza+pound.jpg\" width=\"240\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">He wrote to Harriet\nMonroe, editor of the Rothschild controlled Chicago magazine Poetry, and made\nsure&nbsp; Gitanjali was reprinted ten times\nin nine months. When Tagore visited the United States in 1913, Rothschild\ncontrolled the press greeted him as \u201cthe creator of a new age in literature\u201d.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">In November , the same year he won the Nobel Prize, the first non-European to\nreceive the award.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Rabindranath Tagore\ndedicated his Nobel Prize winner poetry collection Gitanjali to William\nRothenstein.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Tagore expressed his\ngratitude to Yeats\u2019s \u201ccontribution\u201d to the English Gitanjali,.&nbsp; Ezra Pound later spent his Christmas in\nYeat\u2019s home at Sussex.<o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: magenta;\">So much for Tagore.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: magenta;\">How did Pakistan get a\nNo 1 citizen in the form of a poet?<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
