, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Originally named\nMikhail Gruzenberg,&nbsp; Borodin&nbsp; (1884-1951) was a Bolshevik party advisor\nsent by Jew Lenin to China in 1923.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jew Mikhail Borodin\njoined the Bolshevik party in Imperial Russia in 1903 .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1905, Borodin was\nsent by Lenin&nbsp; as a Communist agent sent\nto USA to work underground with Trotsky&nbsp;\nfor whipping up support for killing the Czar and putting Jewish\nCommunism in place<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After the October\nRevolution of 1917, in Russia Borodin&nbsp;\nreturned to Russia. From 1919 to 1922, he worked in , the United States\nand the United Kingdom as a Comintern agent.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While in USA Borodin\nfunctioned as Lenin's personal envoy,&nbsp; a\nspy , an organizer of Communist secret schemes&nbsp;\nabroad, and a a recruiter of talented revolutionaries (like&nbsp; M.N. Roy, who was a co-worker of Ho Chi\nMinh).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After Dr. Sun Yat Sen's\ndeath in 1925, he remained an advisor to the Kuomintang government until\n1927.&nbsp;&nbsp; Borodin was sent by the Kremlin\nto Bolshevise Sun Yat</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;ms mincho&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2011</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sen\nand became Chief Political Adviser to the Kuomintang.&nbsp; His wife, a Jewess, spied in China for\nRothschild's Soviets Jews. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Sun died, Borodin\nin effective charge and it was he who appointed Chiang Kai</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;ms mincho&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2011</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shek to succeed Sun in 1926\u2014such was Rothschild\nfinancial hold. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As Comintern agent in\nChina between 1923 and 1927, Borodin arranged shipments of Soviet arms to the\nKuomintang government in Canton, China.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Borodin negotiated the\nFirst United Front between the Chinese Nationalist Party of Sun Yat Sen and the\nChinese Communist Party.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Under his tutelage,\nboth parties reorganized on the Leninist principles of democratic centralism\nand organized training institutes for mass organizations, such as the Peasant\nTraining Institute, where the young Mao Zedong served.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was a prominent\nadviser to Dr. Sun Yat Sen at that time. Following his suggestion the Whampoa\nMilitary Academy was established.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After Dr. Sun Yat Sen's\ndeath in 1925, he remained an advisor to the Kuomintang government until\n1927,&nbsp;&nbsp; Borodin was sent by the Kremlin\nto Bolshevise Sun Yat</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;ms mincho&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2011</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sen\nand became Chief Political Adviser to the Kuomintang. His wife, a Jewess, spied\nin China for the Soviets.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Sun died, Borodin\nwas left in charge and it was he who appointed Chiang Kai</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;ms mincho&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2011</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shek to succeed Sun in 1926\u2014 such was his Rothschild\nfinancial hold. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Leon Trotsky&nbsp; instructed Borodin to enforce leftist land\nrevolution policies on the Nationalists and to mobilize an army of peasants and\nworkers in order to seize control of the party. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Borodin gave the\nChinese Nationalists Rothschild\u2019s funds in developing a party army, which made\nthem a powerful force in Chinese politics.&nbsp;\nAfter Sun Yat-sen\u2019s death in 1925, Chiang Kai-shek, back from training\nin Moscow, became head of the army.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Soviet embassy in\nPeking was ransacked, and Comintern codes and ciphers and secret documents were\nseized (including a secret plan for the ''Bolshevization of China'' by means of\nterror, guerrilla warfare and infiltration).&nbsp;\nThe fact that he was the holder of the Soviets' highest honor at the\ntime, the Order of the Red Banner, could not save him.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1927 Chiang broke\nwith the communists.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chiang Kai-Shek, head\nof the right wing of the party, purged communists in the bloody Shanghai\nMassacre of 1927 but allowed Borodin to \"escape\" by car to the Soviet\nUnion along with Sun Yat-sen's wife , on getting arm twisted by Rothschild..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Returning to Moscow,\nBorodin served as deputy people\u2019s commissar for labour, deputy director of Tass\nnews agency, and, from 1932, editor of the Moscow Daily News, published in\nEnglish..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1949, he was\narrested in the context of antisemitic repressions and died two years later in\nMay 29, 1951, Siberia , Lefortovo prison , after sever torture.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was the king pin who\nbuilt the loosely structured Nationalist Party (Kuomintang) of Sun Yat-sen into\na highly centralized Leninist-style organization, dying an ignoble martyr\u2019s\ndeath.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Borodin had once\ntowered like a colossus ''over the Chinese scene ... when more than 300,000\nChinese passed in inspection review before him.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Trotsky, had once\nsaid&nbsp; ''The road to Paris and London lies\nvia the plains of Punjab and Bengal - and the towns of China\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">China represented an\nattractive ''Eastern route'' to world revolution.. ''The outcome of the\nstruggle,'' advised Jew Lenin, ''will be determined by the fact that Russia,\nIndia, China, etc., constitute the overwhelming majority of the population of\nthe globe.''<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">Enter Jew Grigorii NaumovichVoitinsky.</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-1kJYUaJANks/Ui0s0zAUw6I/AAAAAAAAltc/ICd4AxdbM3U/s1600/200px-G.N._Voitrngsky.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-1kJYUaJANks/Ui0s0zAUw6I/AAAAAAAAltc/ICd4AxdbM3U/s1600/200px-G.N._Voitrngsky.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Grigorii N. Voitinsky\n(1893-1953); &nbsp;was emissary to China from\nSoviet Third Communist International (Comintern). &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1920, the Soviet\nUnion established the Far Eastern Bureau in Siberia, a branch of the Third\nCommunist International, or the Comintern. It was responsible for managing the\nestablishment of a Communist party in China and other countries.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Soon after its\nestablishment, the bureau's deputy manager Voitinsky arrived in Beijing and\ncontacted the Communist leader, Chen Duxiu, in Shanghai.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">The Shanghai Chronicle\nwas set up in 1919 in Shanghai by Rothschild with enormous&nbsp;funds to propagate&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24.545454025268555px;\">Communism</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">..<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Voitinsky was &nbsp;sent over to China by the Comintern chairman,\na Jew named Ovsei-Gershon Aronovich Radomyslsky Apfelbaum., also known as&nbsp; Grigory Yevseevich Zinoviev.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Zinoviev was &nbsp;the longtime head of the Communist\nInternational and was a stooge of Jew Lenin. During Lenin's illness, Zinoviev,\nhis sidekick &nbsp;Kamenev, and Joseph Stalin\nformed a ruling 'triumvirate' (or 'troika') in the Communist Party, playing a\nkey role in the marginalization of Leon Trotsky.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pretty soon &nbsp;Stalin wrestled control of the Leningrad party\norganization and government from Zinoviev and had him dismissed from all\nregional posts, leaving only the Comintern as a potential power base for\nZinoviev. &nbsp;In August 25 1936, Stalin got Zinoviev&nbsp; executed by bullets.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Voitinsky assumed the\nguise of an editor for the newspaper, and soon set up the Comintern's East Asia\nSecretariat in the newspaper office.&nbsp;\nShanghai Chronicle became both a propaganda vehicle for the East Asia\nSecretariat and a cover for Bolshevik activity in China.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The newspaper as a whole played a special\nrole in the early communist movement in China. Voitinsky inculcated Sun Yat Sen\n, and Mao&nbsp; in all the finest details of\nMarxist-Leninist theory.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">Enter Jew Morris\nAbraham Cohen.</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-z1trLHpEP18/Ui1ZQDeQoVI/AAAAAAAAlts/FzgKU9LvP1U/s1600/Morris+Two+Gun+Cohen.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-z1trLHpEP18/Ui1ZQDeQoVI/AAAAAAAAlts/FzgKU9LvP1U/s320/Morris+Two+Gun+Cohen.jpg\" width=\"240\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here is a British born\nJew , a criminal delinquent , &nbsp;a\npickpocket and thief as a child who became a Chinese General, thanks to\nRothschild.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The attractive wife of Sun Yat Sen loved him more that her own life, and he too reciprocated, though he was an ace womaniser.</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-VlKOHDZKYjE/Ui1aEaPKn_I/AAAAAAAAlt0/VVUwprGbg30/s1600/SOONG+CHING+LING+2ND+WIFE+OF+SUN+YAT+SEN.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-VlKOHDZKYjE/Ui1aEaPKn_I/AAAAAAAAlt0/VVUwprGbg30/s400/SOONG+CHING+LING+2ND+WIFE+OF+SUN+YAT+SEN.jpg\" width=\"298\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Above: Song Ching Ling , wife of Sun Yat Sen.</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE : &nbsp;<i>It was\n1922. Cohen secured an interview with Sun Yat-sen in his home. &nbsp;Morris recalled this first meeting with his\nidol: \u201c\u2026we\u2019d hardly begun to talk when Madame Sun walked in, and after that I\u2019d\nonly got eyes for her\u201d</i> <b>(Charles\nDrage, Two-Gun Cohen, p. 83</b>). UNQUOTE&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cohen wrangled a job\nfor himself as a personal body guard for Sun Yat Sen\u2019s household. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He sort of &nbsp;worshipped Madame Sun to the point of\nself-sacrifice. &nbsp;Once in Hong Kong he nearly died for her.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Everybody thought that\nMorris was lying as usual about his secret affair .&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">But everything fell in\nplace when he died in 1970 at Manchester England at the age of 83 .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was buried in the Blakely Jewish cemetery in Salford. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Madame Sun Yat Sen , the VP of China , displayed rare character and paid\nfor his tombstone, dictating the inscription in English and Chinese via the\nChinese Embassy in London: <i><span style=\"color: blue;\">\u201cThis is the tomb of Ma Kun ( </span><span style=\"color: red;\">pet name </span><span style=\"color: blue;\">) inscribed by Soong\nQingling, vice chairman of the People\u2019s Republic of China Beijing.\u201d </span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What more evidence is\nrequired for this amazing relationship?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-AIZgqyWWcyg/Ui1cOwL0V1I/AAAAAAAAluA/aW4nhbSrUfo/s1600/Tw+Gun+Cohen+grave.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-AIZgqyWWcyg/Ui1cOwL0V1I/AAAAAAAAluA/aW4nhbSrUfo/s640/Tw+Gun+Cohen+grave.jpg\" width=\"444\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People go there to the cemetery\nto read the inscription Madame Soong Ching Ling placed on Morris\u2019s tombstone,\nin the Jewish cemetery.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Morris was a petty thief and\npickpocket under the tutelage of a crook known as \"Harry the Gonof.\"\n(Gonof means thief in Yiddish.) a Fagin type character who employed a child gang. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">He smashed up glass windows\nin order to drum up business for an glass merchant who bribed him. When he was caught and brought before the Juvenile Court. when he claimed to be two years younger in\norder to get a lighter sentence.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">How did he become so close to Sun Yat Sen?</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cohen migrated to Canada .&nbsp; After the war, Cohen frequented\nChinese gambling dens in Canada, where he became friends with many Chinese\nimmigrants.&nbsp; Cohen had become a great\nhero to the Chinese-Canadian community in Saskatoon when he came to the aid of\nyoung Sun Yat Sen , a friend of Mah Sam, the Chinese restaurant owner.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sun had come to Canada\nmeet Jewish Communist agents. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was rewarded for\nthis fine effort and he went back hoppety hop to England to buy his\nimpoverished tailor father Yosef a new house . .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This heist was set up by Morris Cohen himself, on the prompting of Rothschild's agents. Cohen fought against all odds and saved Sun Yat Sen -- Bollywood movie style.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sen was\nregarded by the Canadian indentured Chinese labourers as \"George Washington\" of China after he\noverthrew the Qing Dynasty in 1911 and became the founder of the first Republic\nof China. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">So i</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">n 1922, by special invitation , Morris Cohen traveled to China hired to work\nfor Yat-Sen as a bodyguard.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-bVWVoxPfVo8/Ui1f4JHIGaI/AAAAAAAAluM/3WteRaDpyKc/s1600/China_Chang_SunYatSenMorrisComp.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"376\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-bVWVoxPfVo8/Ui1f4JHIGaI/AAAAAAAAluM/3WteRaDpyKc/s400/China_Chang_SunYatSenMorrisComp.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He shadowed Sun Yat Sen\neverywhere all the while letting Rothschild know what is happening. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once when he was </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">nicked by a bullet, when 3 assailants attacked Sun ( this time a real attack ) , Cohen started carrying a\nsecond gun. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">All were </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">intrigued by Sun's gun-toting protector and\nbegan calling him \"Two-Gun Cohen.\"&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The name stuck.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cohen trained Sun's &nbsp;armed forces to handle guns and &nbsp;shoot, and was known as a colonel in Sun\nYat-sen's army. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1922, he was named\nDirector of the Chinese secret service.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His standing as a loyal\naide to Sun Yat-sen helped him maintain good relations with both Kuomintang and\nChinese Communist leaders. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was instrumental in\nsmuggling in weapons sent by Rothschild\u2019s agents using Opium money. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was also an adviser\nto Wu Tiecheng, the Canton police chief, who eventually became the mayor of\nShanghai. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was involved in\nsetting up the first Military Academy in China at </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Whampoa. A picture exists of Morris in a white\ntropical suit and hat, towering over a hundreds of Chinese cadets. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">Pictures exist of Morris with Mao Tse Tung.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Though Morris Cohen knew\ngood Chinese , as he worked with Chinese and played in their gambling dens at Canada , he pretended that he did NOT\nknow the language , and Madame Sun acted as his interpreter\u2014 and they often travelled nice and cosy together.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Chinese were one of\nthe largest and probably most visible immigrant populations in British\nColumbia, brought there as miners during the gold rush, then as laborers\nbuilding the transcontinental railway. Many provided much needed services in\nthese male-dominated towns \u2013 restaurants as well as brothels and\ngambling dens.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">On Sun Yat</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;ms gothic&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2011</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sen's death bed, this Jew was commended\nto Chiang Kai</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;ms gothic&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2011</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shek and he was\nemployed as liaison officer between the Canton Government and all foreign\nConsulates</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;ms gothic&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2011</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">General. Cohen became\nknown in China as Moi</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;ms gothic&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2011</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sha,\nand was made Military Counsellor to the Cantonese Forces, and a General,\nalthough still a British subject .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Madame Sun forced him\nto marry and Cohen went back to Canada and married a Jewess Judith Clark.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cohen &nbsp;spent extensive periods in Hong Kong, which as\na British colony seemed fairly safe from Japanese attack. &nbsp;Madame Sun had settled there, and Cohen served\nas her personal bodyguard. &nbsp;In December\n1941, he started urging her to escape, sure she would make an ideal target for\nthe Japanese.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Japanese attacked\nHong Kong, Malaya, and the Philippines concurrently with Pearl Harbor, on\nDecember 7\u20138.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">By December 25, the British had lost Hong Kong. &nbsp;Cohen made sure that Madame Sun&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">was safely airlifted out to Chongqing . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Co</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">hen was caught and taken\nto the mainland for questioning because the Japanese were aware of his\nreputation and close ties to the Chinese government. &nbsp;He was imprisoned and beaten upbadly.\nAfter a week or so, a rumor spread that he was to be executed. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He gave away everything he had to other\nprisoners, and was then forced to kneel down in the interrogation room. A\nJapanese officer drew a huge Samurai sword, and Cohen muttered Shema Yisrael\nand awaited his end. &nbsp;Instead he got a\nkick in the ribs and was set free\u2014 thanks to Rothschild\u2019s magic.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1948, he helped\nZionists in Palestine acquire weapons and trained them.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After the 1949\nCommunist takeover, Cohen was one of the few people who was able to move\nbetween Taiwan and mainland China.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the newly formed United Nations began\nthe debate on the UN Resolution on the Partition of Palestine, following the UN\nSpecial Committee on Palestine recommendation, Morris Cohen flew to San\nFrancisco in 1945 and convinced the head of the Chinese delegation to abstain from\nvoting when he learned they planned to oppose partition. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Eye witnesses say that Morris Cohen walked in like a kingpin as if he owned the place.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Supreme Authority\nof the Holy Office, in a decree dated 15 November 1957, forbade the works of de\nChardin to be retained in libraries, including those of religious institutes.\nHis books were not to be sold in Catholic bookshops and were not to be\ntranslated in other languages.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A decree of the Holy\nOffice dated 30 June 1963, under the authority of Pope John XXIII warned that\n\u201c. . . it is obvious that in philosophical and theological matters, the said\nworks (de Chardin\u2019s) are replete with ambiguities or rather with serious errors\nwhich offend Catholic doctrine. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Vicariate of Rome\n(a diocese ruled in the name of Pope Paul VI by his Cardinal Vicar) in a decree\ndated 30 September 1963 , required that Catholic booksellers in Rome should\nwithdraw from circulation the works of de Chardin, together with those books\nwhich favour his erroneous doctrines. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1912 Joffe was\narrested by the Czar while visiting Odessa and imprisoned for 10 months and\nthen exiled to Siberia.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1917, Joffe, freed\nfrom the Siberian exile by the February Revolution, joined forces with Trotsky,\nwho had just returned from abroad.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Joffe the Bolshevik\npolitician was sent to China in August 1922 as the Russian ambassador\u2014or rather,\nRussian Envoy Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary to China ruled by Sun Yat Sen.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Later he became\nPolitical Adviser to Chiang Kai</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;ms mincho&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2011</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shek\nin 1926 and organised the Red Section of the Kuomintang. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1923, Joffe signed\nan agreement with Sun Yat-Sen in Shanghai on aid to Kuomintang on the\nassumption that the latter would cooperate with Chinese Communists.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sun-Joffe Manifesto or\nthe Joint Manifesto of Sun and Joffe was an agreement signed between Sun\nYat-sen and Adolph Joffe on January 26, 1923 for the cooperation of Republic of\nChina&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kuomintang and Soviet Union .&nbsp; It\nannounced that Russia would cooperate with the KMT in its struggle to unify\nChina at that time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Microcredit has driven poor households into a debt trap. One of the\nimpacts of high interest rates has been to force poor households into a debt\ntrap. Households borrowing money have to earn more than the interest accumulating\non the loan or face increasing debt. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Officials working for\nthe microcredit institutions often had their own wages based on repayment rates\npaid by lenders and sometimes used coercion to collect repayments on loans. Black\nmarket activity thrived.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A GI could buy a package of cigarettes for eight cents\nand resell them to a Russian soldier for 100 AM marks or $10.&nbsp; A 5-cent candy bar sold for $5.&nbsp; K-rations brought $20 and a pound of coffee\n$25.&nbsp; G.I.s sold watches for the\nequivalent of $500 to $2500 each.&nbsp; By one\nestimate, more than 33,000 GIs sent home an average of $12,000 from\nBerlin.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only when the U.S. Army reached\nan overdraft of $271,000,000 did Congress act.&nbsp;\nOriginal Allied plans called for approximately fifteen billion AM marks\nto be printed. font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hotsumi Ozaki was an\nadviser to Japanese Prime Minister Fumimaro Konoe, who trusted him with his\nlife. &nbsp;It was a dastardly breach of trust\nfor the PM.&nbsp; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hotsumi would be the ONLY\nJapanese citizen to be hanged for treason by Japan.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hotsumi Ozaki\nphotographed every single blue print of the attack on Pearl Harbor including\nthe grid of all the US ships in Pearl Harbour, and passed it on to Richard\nSorge . &nbsp;The attack could be done even in\npoor visibility -- &nbsp;the Japanese knew\neverything.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Jacob, Indian\nmilitary commander in the Bangladesh Liberation War of 1971; former Governor of\nGoa and Punjab.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">David Sassoon, merchant\nand founder of the Sassoon family<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Albert Abdullah David\nSassoon, merchant<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sassoon David Sassoon,\nEnglish merchant<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sassoon J. David,\nbanker (founder of Bank of India) and member of the Bombay Municipal\nCorporation<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1939, defecting GRU\ncourier Whittaker Chambers identified Currie to Assistant Secretary of State\n(in charge of security) Adolf Berle as a \"fellow traveler\" who \"helped\nvarious Communists\" in the underground . Currie always remained in the\nshadows using several buffers around him.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Currie was sent to be\nHead of the Economic Mission to China as personal envoy of the President to\nconfer with Chiang Kai-shek and other leading executives of the Kuomintang. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Currie the&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">Canadian born economist who headed the word bank\nin 1949, &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">was in Soviet Communist intelligence archives as spy code 'VIM'. &nbsp;Currie was chief economist at the\nColombian National Planning Department from 1971 to 1981.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hardly anybody knows of\nCurrie\u2019s ulterior and shadowy connections with the Colombian communists today.</span><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"> </span><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Colombian Communist Party\n(Partido Comunista Colombiano, PCC) was formally accredited by the Rothschild\ncontrolled Comintern in 1930 .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since 1964, the Colombian\nMarxist\u2013Leninist revolutionary guerrilla organization is involved in the &nbsp;armed conflict since 1964. &nbsp;&nbsp;The\nFARC \u2013EP <i>Fuerzas Armadas Revolucionarias\nde Colombia\u2014Ej\u00e9rcito del Pueblo&nbsp; </i>is\nconsidered a terrorist organization by the Government of Colombia. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nFARC\u2013EP claim to be a peasant army with a political platform of agrarianism and\nanti-imperialism inspired by Bolivarianism. &nbsp;Actually they are organized drug\nrunners , who also produce and distribute refined illegal drugs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Currie\u2019s economic\nstrategies included the forceful removal of small farmers to promote huge industrial\nfarms known as Latifundio . &nbsp;We &nbsp;have heard about Mao's \"great leap \" in China in a similar way too, right?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">Enter Jew Michael Greenberg&nbsp;</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Michael Greenberg (28\nNovember 1914 \u2013 19 April 1992) was a communist .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1942 Greenberg\nbecame a China specialist at the Board of Economic Warfare and an assistant to\nthe agency's head, &nbsp;Lauchlin Currie. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Greenberg later worked\nas a Foreign Affairs Economist in the Administrative Division, Enemy Branch, of\nthe Foreign Economic Administration. &nbsp;Greenberg\nsupplied information concerning China.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Greenberg also became\nManaging Editor of the Institute of Pacific Relations (IPR) publication,\nPacific Affairs in 1941.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Greenberg lost his U.S.\ncitizenship and was denied a passport by the British Home Office , even as late\nas the 1970s.&nbsp; &nbsp;His British passport ( he was born in Britain\n) was never restored to him, and the accusations continued to hound him .. In\n1958, he was recruited as Economic Advisor to the Central Bank of Ceylon, a\nRothschild\u2019s spot.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">Enter German Jew Karl\nMarx.</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-3vtpRFuLkac/UjYPgKHy2bI/AAAAAAAAl4Y/xgBrTTWtQFI/s1600/images.jpgy65uj.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-3vtpRFuLkac/UjYPgKHy2bI/AAAAAAAAl4Y/xgBrTTWtQFI/s400/images.jpgy65uj.jpg\" width=\"386\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I can see some of my\nreaders saying --what do you mean by enter-- we already know this fellow!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Well you know fu#k all\nabout him.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So listen up.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This Jew by the name of\nChaim Hirschel Mordechai ( 5 May 1818 \u2013 14 March 1883), too the whole world for\na ride along with his blood relative cousin German Jews Rothschild.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">He is better known as\nKarl Heinrich Marx, and known best as \"the father of communism\".</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karl Marx was born into\na Jewish family of rabbis.&nbsp; He married\ninto fellow international Jewish financial dynasties, through Joseph\nSebag-Montefiore and Montagu Samuel.&nbsp; He\nwas also related to Jewess Hannah Rothschild; on both her paternal and maternal\nside<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hannah was married to\nScottish liberal politician Archibald Primrose, 5th Earl of Rosebery.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Marx moved to London in\n1849 and died there, but not before he took the world for a royal ride. While\nMarx wrote Das Kapital in the British Museum reading room, his famous cousin\nLionel de Rothschild, was the powerful kingmaker MP for the City of London (1847\u20131868\n&amp; 1869\u20131874).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The name \"Rothschild\" is NOT mentioned in Das\nKapital .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But if you make a spelling\nmistake on your computer and type in Rothcsild instead of Rothschild, the\ncomputer will correct you, as if this is NOT a proper noun.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">Enter German Jew Eva\nSandberg.</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n</div>\n<div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-9Ww4W3u4tV4/UjYRvxtIlHI/AAAAAAAAl4k/li0gmPQ-hlA/s1600/be0498a6-a20f-42b3-8aca-eaeb20ab38d4.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-9Ww4W3u4tV4/UjYRvxtIlHI/AAAAAAAAl4k/li0gmPQ-hlA/s320/be0498a6-a20f-42b3-8aca-eaeb20ab38d4.jpg\" width=\"240\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">German Jewess Eva\nSandberg was sent to Russia to learn the essentials of Communism and be an\nagent for the Russian Communist Jews in Communist China.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She got caught by Mao ,\nand she and her Chinese husband Emi Xiao , a very close childhood friend and\nclassmate of young Mao would spend 7 years in solitary jail without knowing the\nother spouse was in jail too.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Emi Xiao was Mao's\nschool mate first at Dongshan elementary school, and then later at Changsha\nhigh school. While at Changsha, Emi and Mao created the \"New Citizen\nSociety\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1918 Yang\nChangji&nbsp; their teacher, was invited to\nteach at Beijing University. He took both Mao Zedong and Emi Xiao along with\nhim.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Emi Xiao went to France\nto get brainwashed into Communism .&nbsp; In\n1922 he returned to China and was catapulted to be the secretary of the\nCommunist Youth League Executive Committee..&nbsp;\nFrom 1923 to 1924, he attended Moscow University of the Toilers of the\nFar East to study advanced communism and to help introduce more Chinese\nstudents to Communism in Moscow.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1925&nbsp; Emi Xiao was caught in the web of an\nattractive&nbsp; Jew Russian Communist\nhoneypot by the name of Vasa who came from&nbsp;\nVladivostok in 1925 to teach Russian at Beijing University.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Emi 's Russian was now\nexcellent and he was now chosen for Jewish Communist spying activities and in\n1927 he went to to Russia .&nbsp; Before he\nleft, he married Vasa and they went to Vladivostok together.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He came back to China\nand soon went back to Moscow again in 1930 and yet again in 1934 as the Chinese\ndelegate to represent the Chinese Writer's Union, a Communist organization.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1934, he met Eva\nSandberg, the German Jew photographer.&nbsp;\nEva Sandberg was born to a Jewish family in Breslau in 1911, in 1934, it\nwas arranged that she must go to Russia for Communist indoctrination and also become\na Russian citizen.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1935 a pregnant Eva\nSandberg and Chinese Emi Xiao got married and soon had their first son. In 1938\nEmi went back to China to grab the spoils of the Long March from his friend\nMao, leaving Eva behind in Russia. In 1940 Eva went to China and joined Emi and\nsoon has a second son.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Eva did NOT know that\nin her absence Emi was taking an attractive Chinese Opera woman Gan Lu , 27\nyears younger&nbsp; than him , to his bed. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Eva was furious when\nshe came to know about this adultery and in a huff she packed up the children\nand went to Moscow, even before the divorce was formalized.. She ended up in\nKazakhstan, and started photography as a profession..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Meanwhile Emi was doing\nwell as the blue eyed boy of Mao and he was working on a biography of Mao ,\nwhich would see the light of day only in 1953.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1949 Emi was unable\nto please his Chinese lover anymore and their relationship soured . So Emi went\nto Kazakhstan to see Eva and his sons and reclaimed his lost family after\napologies galore.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Eva worked for TASS,\nthe Soviet news agency and then for the China News Agency.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She traveled all over\nChina and even went to Tibet to take selective pictures and show how Tibet\nneeded big brother Communist rule, to save unhappy Tibetans ( sic !)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The relationship\nbetween Russia and China had fallen apart publicly by 1960.&nbsp; In 1964, Eva became a Chinese citizen, though\nstill a Russian spy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In June 1967, Emi and\nEva were arrested by the Red Guard .&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Mao knew that his old school mate was spying\nagainst him and threw him into Qincheng Prison of Beijing .&nbsp; Emi would spend the Cultural Revolution in\nsolitary confinement with Eva in another part of prison .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They were not released until 1974 and were\nsubject to supervision and house arrest after that.&nbsp; The seven years in solitary had broken Emi's\nhealth. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He emigrated to the\nUnited States and soon got his Ph.D. from the University of California,\nBerkeley, where his thesis was entitled Lenin\u2019s Economic Thought Prior to the\nOctober Revolution. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Henry Robinson Luce\n(April 3, 1898 \u2013 February 28, 1967), a magazine magnate, was called \"the\nmost influential private citizen in the America of his day\u2014after all he was\nrunning Rothschild\u2019s most important manin stream media like Time, Fortune ,\nLife and radio programs , newsreels etc.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Luce was born in\nTengchow China to missionary parents. &nbsp;He studied at Yale in China.&nbsp; In 1920, he graduated from Yale College USA ,\nwhere he was a member of the usual Skull and Bones.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;
