font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Soon he would be\nworking for Rothschild controlled Chicago Daily News and The Baltimore\nNews.&nbsp; &nbsp;He was an&nbsp; influential member of the Republican Party..\nAn instrumental figure behind the so-called \"China Lobby\", he played\na large role in steering American foreign policy and popular sentiment in favor\nof Nationalist leader Chiang Kai-shek and his wife Soong Mei-ling.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After the\noutbreak of full-scale war between China and Japan in 1937, Luce called for\ngreater U.S. support of China's war effort, and particularly for the\nNationalist government led by Chiang Kai-Shek.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; line-height: 150%;\">We worship all false gods.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These four leaders met\nwith top CPSU leaders at Moscow. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The first\nmeeting was attended from the Soviet side by Comrades Suslov, Malenkov and\nMolotov.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the third day &nbsp;Comrade Stalin made an appearance, and he did\nso for subsequent days too . Stalin only\nlistened rarely sat at the table but kept pacing up and down smoking his pipe. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Rothschild stooge Stalin\ntold C Rajeshwara Rao that Nehru was too popular to be brought down by a\nChinese model revolution . </span></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>Stalin told the\ngruesome foursome that India was not an independent country , but was still ruled\nindirectly by proxy by British colonialists.&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This was in 1951, 4 years after\nour Indian independence. &nbsp;He said that\nthe Communists could eventually advance only by heading an armed revolution..\n... Stalin discusses the armed Communist struggle whose fountain head was\nTelengana with C Rajeshwara Rao, whom he knew worshipped himself and Lenin.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Stalin suddenly said\nthe Communist Party of India is sending misleading reports to Moscow on\nconditions in India, and that he gets his own intelligence reports too. &nbsp;And that put cold water on the heads of the\ngruesome foursome Indian Communists who went against their own motherland 4 years\nafter Independence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: 1.2pt;\">\n<span lang=\"EN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Makineni\nBasavapunnaiah&nbsp;</span><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">was a member of the CPM&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">Politburo</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;and\nparticipated in the Telengana Rebellion. Marx called his theory \u201cscientific socialism,\u201d not because he followed the scientific method, but merely because it was dialectical and materialist.&nbsp;</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\nDialectics is not scientific as much as practical. Radicals, including Pierre-Joseph Proudhon (1809-65) and the Chartist movement in England, had long used language that modern-day readers would identify as \u201cMarxist\u201d\u2014\u201cto enjoy political equality, abolish property\u201d; \u201creserve army of labour\u201d and so forth.<br /><br />What, then, was his contribution?<br /><br />Much of his time was spent disagreeing with other radicals, attacking Proudhon in particular, whom he likened to one of the \u201cbourgeois economists\u201d. Far more significantly, he attempted to provide an overall theoretical description of how capitalism worked, especially in Das Kapital, which was published in 1867.<br /><br />Marx's Das Kapital, fails to mention that money is printed out of thin air and keeps the name of his cousins, the Rothschilds, out of it, despite the fact that they were the richest and most powerful capitalist family in the whole world\u2026.<br /><br />Rothschild hired Marx to draft a social doctrine to invert moral order for centralizing their nation state\u2019s wealth Into Rothschild controlled coffers... Marx saw free trade as positive because it undermines established nations and cultures.<br /><br />Millions of people are still under the misapprehension that Marxism / Communism is against profiteering dishonest banks and multi national companies.. The Rothschild banking family - the richest and most powerful banksters, for the past 200 years - financed Karl Marx's pretense of an attack on the profiteering dishonest.banksters, in order to fool the masses, and it worked. ..<br /><br />Marx's hidden message was: \u201cForget your individual rights and privileges and trust in the State and the Trade Unions, and they'll do your thinking for you.\u201d ..Millions of people believed that nonsense, and subsequently allowed 'others' to do their thinking for them.<br /><br />The trade unions and the governments are ALL working for the Rothschild's - who own the banks, including Bank of England, US Federal Reserve,and all the big multi national companies, dangle politicians like rag dolls and hold all of the people as tax-debt slaves, through their corrupt central banks and their funny money.<br /><br />Marx's writing style was a calamity: full of sometimes puerile vehemence, Marx heaped scorn on his opponents, inaugurating the long Marxist tradition of mercilessly deriding anyone with incorrect opinions. In Marx\u2019s pamphlets, mudslinging abounds: Marx's heavy-handed insults tend to make us doubt Marx himself, since he relies so much on vituperation instead of reasoned argument.<br /><br />Marx's conclusion that aggregate price and profit are determined by\u2014and equal to\u2014aggregate value and surplus value is bullshit. There goes his his theory that the exploitation of workers is the sole source of profit.<br /><br />Marx's essential idea, was that capitalism would become less and less profitable and that its downward spiral toward the abyss of deflation\u2014lower prices, lower profits\u2014would be followed by worldwide revolution.<br /><br />The laws of dialectics at the very base of Marxism are fundamentally flawed-- some are \"truisms with no specific Marxist content\", others \"philosophical dogmas that cannot be proved by scientific means\", yet others just bullshit. Some Marxist \"laws\" are vague and can be interpreted differently, but these interpretations generally fall into one of the aforementioned categories of flaws as well.<br /><br />CONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_4BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_4b+seedb8ND\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_1B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6777305185001996910\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_1M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1525771153288#c6777305185001996910\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 8, 2018 at 2:49 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_1MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nGerman Jew Karl Marx had planned to write Das Kapital in multiple volumes. He finished the first. But when it came to writing the second, on realizing that he would face insurmountable intellectual hurdles ( including being charged of mindless plagiarism ) , he pleaded illness.. when in reality he was fit as a fiddle and going around doing everything else.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nWhat Marx accomplished was to produce such a comprehensive, dramatic, and fascinating vision that it could withstand innumerable empirical contradictions, logical refutations, and moral revulsions at its effects.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe Marxian vision took the overwhelming complexity of the real world and made the parts fall into place, in a way that was intellectually exhilarating and conferred such a sense of moral superiority that opponents could be simply labelled and dismissed as moral lepers or blind reactionaries.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nMarxism was \u2013 and remains \u2013 a mighty instrument for the acquisition and maintenance of political power.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nKarl Marx's value theory and law of the tendency of the rate of profit to fall are a crock of shit.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nMarx does not even understand socialism. Socialism cannot be accomplished only through class conflict and a proletarian revolution.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL DECLARES DAS KAPITAL IS THE BIGGEST TUB OF BULLSHIT.. EVER WRITTEN</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIn the Nature and Causes of the Wealth of Nations, Jew Rothschild\u2019s agent Adam Smith proposed that the free market, where producers are free to produce as much as they want and charge consumers the prices they want, would result in the most efficient and desirable economic outcome for consumers and producers alike due to the \u201cInvisible Hand.\u201d</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe rationale for his proposal was that each individual would try to maximize his own benefit. In doing so, consumers would only pay as much as or less than they would value the benefit derived from a good, and producers would only sell for as much as or higher than they would have spent on producing a good.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIn his idealistic economy, there would be no surplus or deficit supply or demand; markets would always be in equilibrium, and the benefits to consumers and producers alike would be maximized. There would be a limited role for the government in such an economic system.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIn contrast, Karl Marx in his Das Kapital reasoned that workers would be exploited by any capitalist, or factory owners, for the capitalist system provides an inherent advantage to the already rich and a disadvantage to the already poor segments of society. The rich would get richer and the poor would get poorer. Furthermore, the \u201ccapitalist\u201d is always in a better position to negotiate a low wage for his workers, he argued.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nOne of his notable and more contentious theories \u2013 the labor theory of value \u2013 claims that the value of a good or service is directly connected to the amount of labor required for its production. Interestingly, Karl Marx also had his own drastic, political ideas that were far away from those of Adam Smith\u2019s.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: small;\">Adam Smith? Furthermore, people performing tougher jobs life working in the ER or handling a nuclear reactor did not receive incentives for their work, because that would anger the ordinary worker.<br /><br />When China opened its bamboo doors, in 1986, the ship I commanded was the first to be drydocked at Qingdao<br /><br />At the grand dinner ( 35 courses ) I saw a fellow sittingnext to the ShipYard Chairman\u2014always quiet. I asked the interpreter why is he not talking\u2014is he dumb? Well he was the Chauffeur of the Chairman\u2014getting same wages ..<br /><br />A nuclear scientist gets same wages as his shit house cleaner. Without incentives, people performing tougher jobs will not be motivated enough to work better or to innovate.<br /><br />Like any despotical regimes, communism was founded on tyranny, which entails the use of terror and fear as tools to control the crowd. History has proven on many occasion that every society based on oppression has rebelled against the regime.<br /><br />THE MOMENT CHINA HAS A WAR WITH INDIA PRESIDENT XI WILL BE HUNG BY THE CHINESE PEOPLE. font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">PORTUGUESE INQUISITION\nIN GOA ORDERED BY FRANCIS XAVIER </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">VADAKAYIL</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Y_zx0ET6MDY/Uh3S_iBMHFI/AAAAAAAAlbY/3NuHoJ2_ytw/s1600/13.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><br /></span></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I remember giving my\nChief Engineer ( an ex-shipmate ) a lecture on mindsets.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When we did our Second\nMate\u2019s , Mate\u2019s and Masters exams , we did NOT ask our parents for money. &nbsp;&nbsp;This MINDSET\nadvise was given to us by our seniors. &nbsp;And\nwe passed on this message to our juniors.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">My ex-Chief Engineer\u2019s son\nwas spending his father\u2019s money when he got down for his Second Mate\u2019s in\nEngland.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So I went to his house\nand told my sailor friend and his wife. \u201c You are destroying your son\u2019s mindset\nby sending him money, for easy life . &nbsp;His\nbatch mates who run out of money have taken up part time jobs in England \u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So my friend replied\nback, and I knew for sure it was lame bull from his body language \u201c He once got mugged and that is why\nwe don\u2019t want his to travel to any workplace\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even today his son is a\nSecond Mate ( a two striper ) . He passed this exam after several attempts. &nbsp;Today all his batch mates are senior ship\ncaptains\u2014 he is still a Second mate. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What a disgrace !!.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When I was appearing\nfor my Mate\u2019s exam, we were all standing in queue at Mumbai exam hall. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One of my batch mates\nwho had not seen me for 5 years standing at the tail of the queue shouted \u201c\nAjit, well prepared? \u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I turned back smiled\nand shouted back \u201c <i>Saala, hum fail hoyega\n, toh kaun pass hoyega</i>!! \u201c (Meaning: Buddy, &nbsp;if I fail, who will pass?\u201d).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Later when we got back\nto the club in the evening , another friend told me \u201c There were a lot of guys\nwho became your instant enemies , because of your cocky statement. These guys\nhave failed multiple times \u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to the Food\nSecurity Bill, India will need 60 \u2013 61 million tons of grain to feed people who\nwill be eligible for assistance. This means food subsidies will increase to\nabout 19 billionUS dollars in the first year of implementation. &nbsp;And all this if our monsoons hold.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When monsoons fail\nIndia will be taken hostage by your friends in foreign countries, right? &nbsp;Already HAARP is playing around with Indian monsoons.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">How about a legislation\nwill &nbsp;allows farmers to profit\neconomically and grow autonomous, instead of forcing them to further depend\nfurther on the state ruled by desh drohis , who are on the payroll of foreign\nforces .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Will the government not be doing better &nbsp;to provide market incentives and not\ncharitable hand-outs, like for animals in a zoo?.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Madame, we all know who\nyour SLIMY &nbsp;speech writer is, &nbsp;whose pages are full of useless rhetoric,\nwhich you &nbsp;read out like a school girl. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Have you seen any other Indian politician read\nout from pieces of paper, like you? &nbsp;&nbsp;Rack your Italian brain, &nbsp;may be you can think of at least one?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This bill may be\npolitically beneficial for India\u2019s ruling party, but will prove detrimental to\nthe country\u2019s poor and mother India herself..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We know that this food\nsecurity bill is your PET PROJECT and you have been issuing fatwas. What type of democracy are we in where the ruling\nparty is run by a Italian dictator with zilch inner party democracy?</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-9LiFNKBvPQI/Uh7LkEQaQwI/AAAAAAAAldM/4mqMuwnzy1M/s1600/images.jpgfdeb.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"259\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-9LiFNKBvPQI/Uh7LkEQaQwI/AAAAAAAAldM/4mqMuwnzy1M/s400/images.jpgfdeb.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As the head &nbsp;of the National Advisory Council (NAC) which\ndrafted the bill, you know that the bill can be pushed through parliament,\njust before elections, right? &nbsp;For it would be political suicide for any\npolitical party to reject the bill when the mood in the country is volatile . &nbsp;Screw India-- must win the election, right?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Grain imports come\ncheap thanks to the heavy subsidies the vested West offers its &nbsp;farmers and agribusinesses. &nbsp;The Indian farmer thus has NO &nbsp;chance of competing cheap GM food imports. India\u2019s\ncommitment to the WTO prevents it from raising its Minimum Support Price to\nfarmers by a high margin. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With a view to ensuring\nfood security, therefore, the \u2018G33\u2019 group of countries at the WTO \u2014 in which\nIndia has played a leadership role \u2014 has sought an exception to this rule. &nbsp;If the G33\u2019s proposal were to be accepted,\ndeveloping countries would retain the right to pay most of their farmers \u201cabove\nthe market\u201d (ATM) rates for procuring and stockpiling food grain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The unaccountable queen\nbee remote controlled &nbsp;UPA is yet to pay\nmarket rates,leave alone above them, &nbsp;to\nfarmers from whom it buys grain. &nbsp;For all\nits claims to make food security a priority, the government\u2019s Minimum Support\nPrices for farmers in recent years have been way below those prevailing in the\nopen market.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">More producers of grain\n( farmers ) have committed suicide in india , recently than hungry people ,\nright?&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The very low prices of\nthe subsidized food will distort the market and farmers who can\u2019t sell to the\ngovernment-assured program will lose out on the open market because prices will\nbe forced down. Are you sure that more farmers will NOT commit suicide driven\nby the foul bill?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">India cannot give\nincentives to her farmers without falling foul of its international\ncommitments. &nbsp;If it still goes ahead, the\nvested West is entitled to retaliate with crippling trade countermeasures.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unless developed countries agree to cut their\nagro-subsidies, India will also see cheap food imports muscling domestic\nfarmers out of business. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But before the FTA is\ninked into existence, India should incorporate safeguards for its farmers, at\nleast keeping food security in mind. &nbsp;Unless the food security bill is to ensure\nfood imports from big brother.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mankind has made\nhistory by a simple change of mindset-- &nbsp;to an empowered reality of purpose-driven\nliving. The mind is a very potent powerful weapon which can pulverize all\nobstacles.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For a mentally and physically\nfit young man , doing nothing with free food from the government &nbsp;is always a low risk option. &nbsp;To avoid having a car accident, don\u2019t go for\nwork\u2014sit at home and pray. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Resilience is the\nability to work with adversity in such a way that one comes through it unharmed\nor even better for the experience. &nbsp;It &nbsp;means facing life\u2019s difficulties with courage\nand patience \u2013 refusing to give up. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is the quality of\ncharacter that allows a person or group of people rebound from misfortune,\nhardships and traumas. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just see our &nbsp;prince &nbsp;in waiting for PM\u2019s chair. PEOPLE WHO VOTE FOR BJP WILL BE RECORDED AS \"DOOR FOUND CLOSED\" OR \"DELIVERED \" WITH FAKE SIGNATURES ...</div>\n</span><br />MNREGA SCHEME WAS FLOATED TO GIVE FREE WAGES TO POLITICAL WORKERS AND VOTERS OF THE RULING PARTY... NO WORK WAS DONE BUT SALARIES WERE PAID...<br /><br />I REMEMBER ONE DRUNK MNREGA WORKER ( TO CLEAN GUTTERS ) DID NOT DO ONE PAISA OF WORK BUT USED TO SING NICE SONGS SITTING OUTSIDE OUR GATE .. ONE FELLOW SITTING NEXT TO HIM 9 ALSO DRUNK ) HAD ONLY ONE HAND ..<br /><br />ONE OF MY SENIORS ( BIG SHOT ) IN CALCUTTA PORT TRUST DURING JYOTI BASUs COMMIE RULE , TOLD ME SALARIES WERE PAID TO NON-EXISTENT PORT TRUST WORKERS ..<br /><br />HE ASKED ME -- CAN YOU SEE A SINGLE DECENT FENDER ON ANY QUAY.. THEN HE SHOWED ME RECORDS THAT 60 WORKERS WERE EMPLOYED DAILY ONLY TO MAKE FENDERS.. HE SHOWED ME THAT CHAIRMAN OF CPT KNEW ABOUT THIS SCAM..<br /><br />HUNDREDS OF INVISIBLE PORT TRUST WORKERS WHO COLLECTED SALARIES , EXISTED ONLY INSIDE THE PORT..<br /><br />WHEN I ASKED HIM--WHY DONT YOUR STOP IT-- AS YOU HAVE THE POWERS INSIDE THE PORT..HE SAID \"THE COMMIES WILL BREAK MY LEGS \"--POLICE AND JUDICIARY ARE IN THE POCKET OF JYOTI BASU...<br /><br />WHAT WAS THE FOOD SECURITY SCHEME OF THE ITALIAN WAITRESS ALL ABOUT ?...<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red; - CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Rdy7Zb9x-rA/UhJSvjYn31I/AAAAAAAAlTk/fj0taM_0bUE/s1600/images+(6).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lord Irwin&nbsp; ( Edward Frederick Lindley Wood, 1st Earl of\nHalifax ) ,&nbsp; was Viceroy of India from\n1926 to 1931. &nbsp;( below )</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ABlrRZaZ9aY/Ug-_bLF-8rI/AAAAAAAAlOY/egvB1lLx1Z8/s1600/Edward_Frederick_Lindley_Wood,_1st_Earl_of_Halifax.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ABlrRZaZ9aY/Ug-_bLF-8rI/AAAAAAAAlOY/egvB1lLx1Z8/s1600/Edward_Frederick_Lindley_Wood,_1st_Earl_of_Halifax.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He had severe mental (\nBipolar ) and physical ailments ( kidney ) , where it reached a point that he\nwas unable to continue doing justice to his job.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By the way Winston Churchill\nalso had BPAD ( Bipolar disorder ). See his statue below in strait jacket ( <i>for severe mania swing</i> ) at Norwich town centre.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-FDhaJqDZZWA/Ug_AMCwjU_I/AAAAAAAAlOo/Oydylh57ypk/s1600/churchill_body_150x180.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At that time he came to\nknow of a Indian Yogi who could stop his involuntary systems like heart beat at will.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Grasping at the last\nstraw he summoned this Yogi to his bunglow in Simla . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-3SayBpQczm4/Ug--duogIxI/AAAAAAAAlOE/MJoyUSyWQ2E/s1600/175px-Krishnamacharya_scorpion.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>T Krishnamachari</b>&nbsp;( above ) who knew Ashtanga Yoga of the\nancient Maharishi Patanjali &nbsp;diagnosed\nhis ailments and put him though a Yoga regimen, &nbsp;all the while staying with the Viceroy. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Within six months Lord\nIrwin was free of all his ailments ( considered as genetic ) and he was\ngrateful to this Yogi, who did NOT charge any fees. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/--r9JKv82Ww8/UhGXXOp4SuI/AAAAAAAAlR4/z91YsCLT1Tg/s1600/220px-Tirumalai_Krishnamacharya.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lord Irwin out of\ngratitude he took care out his expenses and gave him three companions to\naccompany him. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lord Irwin led a full life and died a normal\ndeath at a ripe old age-- &nbsp;34 years\nlater.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-jRW0kDa2AZU/Ug-_q52hvxI/AAAAAAAAlOg/tx6SS4PBYss/s1600/yoga498x435.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After treating Lord\nIrwin, T Krishnamacharya arrived at Sri Brahmachari\u2019s school, walked all the\nway to a remote cave at the foot of Mount Kailash, &nbsp;where Yogi Rama Mohan Brahmachari lived.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Under Brahmachari\u2019s\ntutelage, Krishnamacharya spent eight years learning yoga , and the sutras of Maharishi\nPatanjali and Ayurveda.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As Hindu ancient tradition\nholds, at the end of his studies with the guru, Krishnamacharya asked what the\nguru &nbsp;dakshina should be.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%; mso-border-bottom-alt: thin-thick-thin-medium-gap windowtext 6.75pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 0in 1.0pt 0in; padding: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; line-height: 150%; mso-border-bottom-alt: thin-thick-thin-medium-gap windowtext 6.75pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 0in 1.0pt 0in; padding: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">you\nmust maintain a diary where you must write how you feel daily. this diary where\nabout must be known to the person at home.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; line-height: 150%; mso-border-bottom-alt: thin-thick-thin-medium-gap windowtext 6.75pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 0in 1.0pt 0in; padding: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; line-height: 150%; mso-border-bottom-alt: thin-thick-thin-medium-gap windowtext 6.75pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 0in 1.0pt 0in; padding: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nclinical history should be taken from both the patient and this diary reader\nhome relation or friend as a patient who is in a manic episode will not be able\nto give an objective view of their condition and risk taking behaviour. The\ndoctor will be looking for several important pieces of information in the\nhistory.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; line-height: 150%; mso-border-bottom-alt: thin-thick-thin-medium-gap windowtext 6.75pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 0in 1.0pt 0in; padding: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; line-height: 150%; mso-border-bottom-alt: thin-thick-thin-medium-gap windowtext 6.75pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 0in 1.0pt 0in; padding: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(BPAD)\nis a psychological illness that involves severe mood swings. These mood swings\ntake the form of depression or mania. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; line-height: 150%; mso-border-bottom-alt: thin-thick-thin-medium-gap windowtext 6.75pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 0in 1.0pt 0in; padding: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; line-height: 150%; mso-border-bottom-alt: thin-thick-thin-medium-gap windowtext 6.75pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 0in 1.0pt 0in; padding: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BPAD\nis a lifelong condition, as of now.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; line-height: 150%; mso-border-bottom-alt: thin-thick-thin-medium-gap windowtext 6.75pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 0in 1.0pt 0in; padding: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; line-height: 150%; mso-border-bottom-alt: thin-thick-thin-medium-gap windowtext 6.75pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 0in 1.0pt 0in; padding: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; line-height: 150%; mso-border-bottom-alt: thin-thick-thin-medium-gap windowtext 6.75pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 0in 1.0pt 0in; padding: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Clinical\ndepression symptoms seen with bipolar disorder include:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; line-height: 150%; mso-border-bottom-alt: thin-thick-thin-medium-gap windowtext 6.75pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 0in 1.0pt 0in; padding: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; line-height: 150%; mso-border-bottom-alt: thin-thick-thin-medium-gap windowtext 6.75pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 0in 1.0pt 0in; padding: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Social\nwithdrawal<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Decreased\nappetite and weight loss, or overeating and weight gain<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; line-height: 150%; mso-border-bottom-alt: thin-thick-thin-medium-gap windowtext 6.75pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 0in 1.0pt 0in; padding: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 0in 1.0pt 0in; padding: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; line-height: 150%; mso-border-bottom-alt: thin-thick-thin-medium-gap windowtext 6.75pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 0in 1.0pt 0in; padding: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On\naverage, a person is free of symptoms for about five years between the first\nand second episodes. As time goes on, the interval between episodes may\nshorten, especially in cases in which treatment is discontinued too soon.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; line-height: 150%; mso-border-bottom-alt: thin-thick-thin-medium-gap windowtext 6.75pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 0in 1.0pt 0in; padding: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; line-height: 150%; mso-border-bottom-alt: thin-thick-thin-medium-gap windowtext 6.75pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 0in 1.0pt 0in; padding: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">this\nis a predominantly biological disorder that occurs in a specific part of the\nbrain and is due to a malfunction of the neurotransmitters (chemical messengers\nin the brain).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">modern\ndoctors like to say that this is hereditary due to faulty genes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; line-height: 150%; mso-border-bottom-alt: thin-thick-thin-medium-gap windowtext 6.75pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 0in 1.0pt 0in; padding: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; line-height: 150%; mso-border-bottom-alt: thin-thick-thin-medium-gap windowtext 6.75pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 0in 1.0pt 0in; padding: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With\nRapid Cycling the patient changes from depression to manic at least 4 times a\nyear and episodes of depression and mania are short.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; line-height: 150%; mso-border-bottom-alt: thin-thick-thin-medium-gap windowtext 6.75pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 0in 1.0pt 0in; padding: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTINUED\nFROM PAGE 1-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; line-height: 150%; mso-border-bottom-alt: thin-thick-thin-medium-gap windowtext 6.75pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 0in 1.0pt 0in; padding: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; line-height: 150%; mso-border-bottom-alt: thin-thick-thin-medium-gap windowtext 6.75pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 0in 1.0pt 0in; padding: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Living\nwith untreated bipolar disorder can lead to problems in everything from your\ncareer to your relationships to your health. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; line-height: 150%; mso-border-bottom-alt: thin-thick-thin-medium-gap windowtext 6.75pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 0in 1.0pt 0in; padding: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; line-height: 150%; mso-border-bottom-alt: thin-thick-thin-medium-gap windowtext 6.75pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 0in 1.0pt 0in; padding: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Treatment\nfor bipolar disorder may include the use of mood stabilizers such as lithium.\nLithium reduces the risk of suicide, self-harm, and death in people with\nbipolar disorder.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; line-height: 150%; mso-border-bottom-alt: thin-thick-thin-medium-gap windowtext 6.75pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 0in 1.0pt 0in; padding: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; line-height: 150%; mso-border-bottom-alt: thin-thick-thin-medium-gap windowtext 6.75pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 0in 1.0pt 0in; padding: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lithium\ncan be used to treat both manic and depressive episodes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; line-height: 150%; mso-border-bottom-alt: thin-thick-thin-medium-gap windowtext 6.75pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 0in 1.0pt 0in; padding: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; line-height: 150%; mso-border-bottom-alt: thin-thick-thin-medium-gap windowtext 6.75pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 0in 1.0pt 0in; padding: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lithium\ndose strength can be decided only by a qualified psychiatrist, on the basis of\nblood tests \u2013 too low and it won't work, too high and it becomes toxic. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; line-height: 150%; mso-border-bottom-alt: thin-thick-thin-medium-gap windowtext 6.75pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 0in 1.0pt 0in; padding: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; line-height: 150%; mso-border-bottom-alt: thin-thick-thin-medium-gap windowtext 6.75pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 0in 1.0pt 0in; padding: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If\nyou become dehydrated, the level of Lithium in your blood will rise, and you\nwill be more likely to get side-effects, or even toxic effects. It can take\nthree months or longer for Lithium to work properly.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; line-height: 150%; mso-border-bottom-alt: thin-thick-thin-medium-gap windowtext 6.75pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 0in 1.0pt 0in; padding: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; line-height: 150%; mso-border-bottom-alt: thin-thick-thin-medium-gap windowtext 6.75pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 0in 1.0pt 0in; padding: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since\nbipolar disorder is a chronic, relapsing illness, it\u2019s important to continue\ntreatment even when you\u2019re feeling better.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; line-height: 150%; mso-border-bottom-alt: thin-thick-thin-medium-gap windowtext 6.75pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 0in 1.0pt 0in; padding: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; line-height: 150%; mso-border-bottom-alt: thin-thick-thin-medium-gap windowtext 6.75pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 0in 1.0pt 0in; padding: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With\nproper medication individuals with bipolar disorder can live full and\nsatisfying lives.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; line-height: 150%; mso-border-bottom-alt: thin-thick-thin-medium-gap windowtext 6.75pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 0in 1.0pt 0in; padding: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; line-height: 150%; mso-border-bottom-alt: thin-thick-thin-medium-gap windowtext 6.75pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 0in 1.0pt 0in; padding: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With\nunderstanding of own condition, maintaing an objective and truthful personal\ndiary , healthy coping skills, and a solid support system, you manage BPAD. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; line-height: 150%; mso-border-bottom-alt: thin-thick-thin-medium-gap windowtext 6.75pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 0in 1.0pt 0in; padding: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Doctors\ndont like to tell your details of this mental condition. At the same time he\ndecides what to do on the basis of info retrieved from you or your home\nrelative.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; line-height: 150%; mso-border-bottom-alt: thin-thick-thin-medium-gap windowtext 6.75pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 0in 1.0pt 0in; padding: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; line-height: 150%; mso-border-bottom-alt: thin-thick-thin-medium-gap windowtext 6.75pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 0in 1.0pt 0in; padding: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You\ncan help control your symptoms by exercising regularly, doing yoga, having a\nhealthy gut by eating right , getting enough sleep, monitoring your moods and\nkeeping stress to a minimum.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; line-height: 150%; mso-border-bottom-alt: thin-thick-thin-medium-gap windowtext 6.75pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 0in 1.0pt 0in; padding: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; line-height: 150%; mso-border-bottom-alt: thin-thick-thin-medium-gap windowtext 6.75pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 0in 1.0pt 0in; padding: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nfollowing signs suggest that your Lithium level is too high. Contact your\ndoctor immediately if you or your home relative notic:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; line-height: 150%; mso-border-bottom-alt: thin-thick-thin-medium-gap windowtext 6.75pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 0in 1.0pt 0in; padding: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">---you\nfeel very thirsty<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; Lithium treatment may\nalso cause low thyroid levels in some people.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; line-height: 150%; mso-border-bottom-alt: thin-thick-thin-medium-gap windowtext 6.75pt; line-height: 150%; mso-border-bottom-alt: thin-thick-thin-medium-gap windowtext 6.75pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 0in 1.0pt 0in; padding: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">--know\nyour doctor's mobile number and clinic address.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; line-height: 150%; mso-border-bottom-alt: thin-thick-thin-medium-gap windowtext 6.75pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 0in 1.0pt 0in; padding: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; line-height: 150%; mso-border-bottom-alt: thin-thick-thin-medium-gap windowtext 6.75pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 0in 1.0pt 0in; padding: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">--\nMAKE SURE YOU TAKE YOUR MEDICATION.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It\nis estimated that a person with bipolar disorder will have an average of eight\nto nine mood episodes during his or her lifetime.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"border: none; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Beyond better, acting\nlike the jungle physician,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Taking the form of a\nman to the shoulders,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Holding a conch, a\ndiscus, and a sword,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One thousand heads\nwhite,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To Patanjali, I salute.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://img.youtube.com/vi/9JSTXDSTkXY/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://youtube.googleapis.com/v/9JSTXDSTkXY&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://youtube.googleapis.com/v/9JSTXDSTkXY&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>The Yoga class&nbsp; closes after chanting the Mangala Mantra ,\nwith gratitude :<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>svasti praj\u0101bhya\u1e25\nparip\u0101layant\u0101\u1e41 ny\u0101yena m\u0101rge\u1e47a mah\u012b\u1e41 mah\u012b\u015b\u0101\u1e25<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>gobr\u0101hma\u1e47ebhya\u1e25\n\u015bubhamastu nitya\u1e41 lok\u0101\u1e25 samast\u0101\u1e25 sukhino bhavantu</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Meaning:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">May prosperity be\nglorified,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">May rulers &nbsp;rule the world with law and justice,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">May divinity ( brahmAn\n) and Dharma ( cow ) be protected.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">May all beings be happy\nand prosperous.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Readers must know the\npurpose of chanting Sanskrit mantras as a prayer.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch:-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">POWER OF MANTRAS ON\nHUMAN CONSCIOUSNESS VADAKAYIL</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Wanna see some Ashtanga yoga poses? &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Warning:&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">This yoga is meant ONLY for people who are young and superbly fit. &nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">If you are NOT physically fit and supple you risk grave injury to spine, tendons and ligaments.</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Madonna chanted the\nopening Ashtanga chant on her Ray-of-Light album, and also played an Ashtanga\nteacher in the movie The Next Best Thing.</span></i><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Did anybody say --\"piece of cake?\"</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga asanas help to\nshift lymph fluids around your body in ways that you would not ordinarily be\nable to achieve in daily life .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Because\nthe <b><span style=\"color: red;\">lymphatic system</span></b> is a closed pressure system and has one-way valves that\nkeep lymph moving towards the heart, when one turns upside down like in\nShirshasan &nbsp;( head stand ) , the entire\nlymphatic system is stimulated, thus strengthening your immune system.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://img.youtube.com/vi/be9IipJt51M/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://youtube.googleapis.com/v/be9IipJt51M&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://youtube.googleapis.com/v/be9IipJt51M&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Their job is to filter out and trap bacteria, viruses, cancer cells, and\nother unwanted substances, and to make sure they are safely eliminated from the\nbody.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-F-ey57ulirA/UhGaC6C53TI/AAAAAAAAlSE/T-HCi28TnOg/s1600/imagesNGYUU.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em;
